med pa'i phyir nor thams cad rang gi mdzod dang bang bar bcug go/ /sbed mas 'char ka la gang gi tshe bdag gi khyim thab gson zhing 'dug ste 'tsho zhing sdod pa de'i tshe na khyod rtag pa kho nar byon na da de'i dus la bab ste ko sa

lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang bu ma mchis pa'i slad du nor thams cad rang gi mdzod dang bang bar stsal na/ da khyod kyis bka' mchid tsam yang mi spring ngam zhes yi ge spring ngo / /de nas 'char ka spring yig gi don thos nas 'di snyam

du sems te/ gal te bdag der song bar gyur na gzhi de las 'char ka bud med kyi phyir der song ngo zhes gzhan dag kha zer bar 'gyur gyis bdag gis thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas des lan gnyis sam gsum du rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang / rgyal

po'i byed pa dag byas nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltams pa de'i tshe na nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po thams cad

'dud cing thams cad kyis pho nya dang / dkor sgrom dag gsol nas/ gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rgan po dang / nad pa dang / gum pa gzigs nas thugs byung ste nags su gshegs pa de'i tshe na nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po

de dag las ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad kyis pho nya dang / dkor sgrom 'bul ba rgyun bkum nas lhas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la pho nya dang / dkor sgrom dag bka' stsal cing bskur

nas de lta de ltar rkyen par gyur pa las da yal bar bor na slad kyis gnod pa chen por 'gyur ba de skol dang mtshams 'brel bar mchis pas de dang lhan cig rkyen par mdzad pa'i rigs so/ /'char ka gal te de lta na khyod nyid pho nyar song

shig /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas 'char kas dkor sgrom dag khyer te mnyan yod ga la ba der 'phags nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ sten pa la bsten par mi bya bar bsten pa la bsten

pa bsten par bya ba yin pas je dang por blon po rnams blta bar bya zhing de'i 'og tu rgyal po blta ste/ sbed ma'i phyir rgyal po la gsol ba bya'o snyam nas/ des blon po rnams la blta bar brtsams te smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis kho bo ji ltar

sbed ma dang lhan cig bshes pa de mi shes sam/ de khyim thab dus la bab nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu med pa'i phyir de'i nor thams cad rang gi mdzod dang / bang bar bcug pas de'i phyir kho bo rgyal po la

gsol ba byed kyis khyed kyis grogs gyis shig /de dag gis de bzhin du khas blangs so/ /de nas 'char ka ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba

byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas lan gnyis lan gsum du rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas te/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha bdag gi gnas stsol cig /'char ka khyod sngon gang

du zhugs/ lha blon po'i mchog sbed pa'i sdum par mchis so/ /'char ka song la de nyid du zhugs shig /lha blon po'i mchog sbed pa dus la bab bo/ /gal te de dus la bab na ci de'i khyim yang dus la bab bam/ lha de'i sdum pa ni dus la ma

bab mod kyi 'on kyang de na stan tsam yang ma mchis so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis 'char ka'i gnas byin cig /'char ka'i phyir byung ba dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci lags 'char ka la

gnas ma mchis snyam 'am/ 'di ltar 'char ka sbed ma dang lhan cig mchid mjal bas don gyis na 'char kas sbed ma'i slad du lha la gsol ba lags kyis/ lha 'char ka ni bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu lags pas bram ze ni mi 'dod

bzhin du gzung bar bgyi ba lags te/ 'di legs par bzung na rgyal po zas gtsang legs par bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal pos 'char ka bos te smras pa/ 'char ka ngas khyod ji ltar sbed ma dang lhan cig bshes par sngar ma shes kyis

da song la sbed ma dang / de'i khyim dang / nor thams cad khyod khyer cig /lha bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/ 'char ka sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ba dang / sbed mas 'char ka 'ongs so zhes thos nas sgo khang du 'dug ste ngu bar

brtsams so/ /'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ sbed ma khyod ci'i phyir ngu / des smras pa/ bdag 'tshal ba'i khyim thab dus la bab na ci khyod kyis kyang yongs su btang ngam/ de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis 'thun par smras

na 'di shin du ngu bar 'gyur bas bdag gis 'di tshar gcad par bya'o snyam du rig nas 'char kas sbed ma la smras pa/ sbed ma byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba byed pa gang gis btsun mo grags 'dzin dang / sa 'tsho ma dang / ri dgas skyes la sogs pa

bud med drug khri spangs te rab tu byung ba de dag gi rkang pa'i rdul tsam du yang khyod kyis mi phod do/ /de nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / 'char kas smras pa/ kho bos khyod ma btang bas khyod nyid kyi phyir 'dir 'ongs pa yin no/ /kho bos rgyal po

las khyod dang khyim dang / nor thams cad thob na ci khyod 'di nyid du 'dug gam/ ser skya'i gnas su 'gro/ des bsams pa/ gal te ser skya'i gnas su song nas bram ze mo las srog kyang mi thob bo snyam du rig nas 'di nyid du mchis so

zhes smras te de de nyid du 'dug go/ /de'i tshe na 'char ka la khyim gnyis yod de/ gcig ni mnyan yod na'o/ /gcig ni ser skya'i gnas na'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad de dka' ba

byed pa ci yang med par rig nas/ ci bder dbugs rngub par mdzad ci bder dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / 'bras chan dang / zan dron la sogs pa zhal zas rgya chen po dag kyang gsol bar mdzad/ zhun mar dang / 'bru mar dag gis

sku dag kyang skud par mdzad/ chu dron pos kyang sku bsil bar mdzad cing / grong sde 'dong du gshegs nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma gnyis las lan bcu drug bzlas pa'i 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa gsol te/ klu'i rgyal

po nag pos mngon par bstod pa na rtswa bkra shis 'tshong pa las rtswa gser gyi mdog lta bu dag bzhes nas byang chub kyi gzhi ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ nyid kyis rtswa ma 'khrugs pa'i gdan bshams nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te sku

drang por bsrang nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs nas thugs bskyed cing gsung brjod pa/ ji srid zag med ma thob bar/ /de srid dkyil dkrung gzhig mi bya/ /de yis ji srid zag med pa/ /ma brnyes dkyil dkrung 'jig mi

mdzad/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo'i gung thun la bdud 'byung po dung phyur phrag gsum dang / bye ba phrag drug gi 'khor dang ldan pa byams pa'i stobs kyis mngon par btul te bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud nas tshangs

pas gsol to/ /bA rA Na sIr gshegs nas lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe lnga pa dang / nye lnga dag dang / grong pa'i khye'u mtho ba mtho ba lnga bcu btul to/ /kar pa si'i tshal

gseb tu gshegs nas bzang sde'i tshogs drug bcu bden pa dag la bkod do/ /grong sde 'don du gshegs nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma gnyis bden pa dag la bkod do/ /steng rgyas su gshegs nas ral pa

can stong rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad do/ /ga yA mgo'i mchod rten du gshegs nas dge slong stong po de dag cho 'phrul gsum gyis gdams pa mdzad nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin du mthar thug pa

grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/ /shar pa'i tshal gseb tu gshegs nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bum

phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag go/ /rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs nas 'od ma'i tshal bzhes te shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang ldan pa rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad do/ /

mnyan yod du gshegs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal bzhes te ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdos btul nas/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi

kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi gan du pho nya btang ste/ lha dgyes pa skyed cig /khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thugs su chud de/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad cing / mnyan yod na

rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes spring ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya btang ste/ gzhon nu bdag gis ring du ma mthong ste/ bdag gzhon nu mthong bas yongs su

skom mo zhes gsol pa dang / pho nya de de nyid du rab tu phyung ngo / /pho nya gnyis pa btang ba dang de yang de nyid du rab tu phyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir gang dang gang pho nyar btang ba de dang de de nyid du rab

tu byung ngo / /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas gtsang gis de thos nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de thugs khongs su chud

cing bzhugs/ 'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba dag spyod pa'i tshe ngas gtam rmed pa'i mi dag btang na de dag nyi ma re re zhing gtam khyer te 'ongs nas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gnas pa 'dis gnas so

zhes gtam snyod par byed na/ da gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas bdud rtsi thugs su chud de bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad cing / mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shes thos nas

ngas gtam rmed pa'i mi dag btang na/ 'gas kyang gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i gtam khyer te mi 'ong bar gang dang gang pho nyar btang ba de dang de de nyid du 'dug par gyur na nga ji ltar lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khongs su chud

cing mi 'dug tu rung / 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ khyod kyang der 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /lha bdag gis lha'i spyan sngar bka' mchid 'tshal te mchi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis rang nyid kyis phrin yig

'di skad ces/ ma rum bzhugs pa tshun chad nas/ /bdag gis legs par khyod bsrungs te/ /nyon mongs gdugs kyis rab gdungs pas/ /rgyal ba'i ljon shing sdod cing mchis/ /slob ma'i yal ga rtsa lag gis/ /da ltar khyod

ni rgyas gyur pas/ /gzhan dag bde bas dga' mdzad na/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal sten par gyur/ /gang tshe dang po khyod 'khrungs tshe/ /shin tu don chen mdzad nas ni/ /nye du rjes su gzung mdzad ces/ /de tshe khyod kyis thugs dam bcas/

de slad go 'phang zhi brnyes khyod/ /bdag dang nye du'i tshogs rnams la/ /rjes su thugs brtse nyer bzung ste/ /byon pa'i blo gros mdzad du gsol/ /zhes bris so/ /de nas 'char ka phrin yig de blangs te mnyan yod du 'phags nas de mthar

gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas ji tsam na 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la phrin yig phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis phrin yig klag pa mdzad nas/ 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su gshegs sam/ 'char

ka 'ong ngo / /'char kas sngon gyi gcugs pa de nyid kyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das mi gshegs na bdag gis mthus bkri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/

gang la khrid byed sred pa yi/ /dra bkram gang na'ang yod min pa/ /spyod yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de/ /gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/ /gang la khrid byed sred pa yi/ /dra bkram gang na'ang yod min pa/ /rtsal yas gzhi med sangs

rgyas de/ /gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/ /gang rgyal mi nyams gang la ni/ /'jig rten ma rgyal yod med pa/ /spyod yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de/ /gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/ /gang rgyal mi nyams gang la ni/ /'jig

rten ma rgyal yod med pa/ /rtsal yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de/ /gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/ /'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po zas gtsang la brjod du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

'char ka rgyal ba'i pho nya dag ni de lta bu ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das 'o na rgyal ba'i pho nya dag ji lta bu lags/ skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gon pa rab tu byung ba dag yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchis

par mchid kyis 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab tu byung ste song shig /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sngon tshe rabs rjes pa de dang de dag tu yab dang / yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang /

bla ma'i gnas lta bu dag gi chos dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ga' yang ma bcag pas bka' stsal ma thag tu 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char

ka rab tu phyung shig dang / de ni 'di la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ de la 'di ni

khyod kyi bya ba yin no/ /'di ni khyod kyis bya ba ma yin no/ /'char ka khyod kyis deng phyin cad bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig khyim gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun du spyad pa'i chos thams cad brjod do/ /'char kas

mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos

phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka khyod kyis tsham tshom med par rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug

par mi bya bar sgor 'greng ste shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam zhes 'dri na shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod do zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te zhugs

shig ces zer na 'jug par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin nam zhes 'dri na/ cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /khyod kyis rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas par

mi bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas 'cha' bar mi byed dam zhes 'dri na/ gnas 'cha' bar mi byed do zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gang du gnas 'cha' bar byed ces 'dri na/ dgon pa 'am/

gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ong ngam zhes 'dri na 'ong ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te yun ji tsam na 'ong zhes 'dri na zhag bdun 'das nas so zhes brjod par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das

bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /'char ka 'ong ba'i tshe mnyan yod du nyi ma mang po dag gis

phyin na phyir 'gro ba'i tshe 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus nyi ma gcig gis ser skya'i gnas su phyin to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang ga la ba der song

ste phyin nas mi sgo ba bos te smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod song la rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes sbron cig /des smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang mchis sam/ 'char kas smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod do/ /

sgo bas rgyal po la sbran pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shAkya 'jug tu chug shig /su zhig shAkya zlog par byed/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sgo bas ngo shes nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di

skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod la bcom ldan 'das a rog khya zhes gsung ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'char ka skad las ngo shes nas smras pa/ khyod 'char ka yin nam/ lha bdag skye bos de ltar 'tshal to/ /rgyal pos

smras pa/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin nam/ lha cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid lags so/ /rgyal po seng ge'i khri las brgyal te sa la lhung nas chus dbang bskur bas srog phyir 'ongs nas dris pa/ gzhon nu don thams

cad grub pa 'ong ngam/ lha mchi'o/ /yun ji tsam na 'ong / dgung bdun 'das nas so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag deng la rgyal po'i pho brang dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dag byi dor gyis shig /lha gzhon nu don thams cad grub

pa de rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gnas 'cha' bar mi bgyid do/ /'o na gang du gnas 'cha' bar byed/ dgon pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang du'o/ /gtsug lag khang ci 'dra bar/ 'char kas mnyan yod na gtsug lag

khang ci 'dra ba dag mthong ba de 'dra ba brjod do/ /de'i tshe na rgyal po zas gtsang la skyed mos tshal skye yod dang / n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas la sogs pa skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod pas rgyal pos blon po rnams

la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed deng la/ skyed mos tshal gsum po skye yod dang / n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas dag tu skyed mos tshal re rer yang rgyal byed kyi tshal 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang khang chen bcu

drug dang / khang pa'i gzhi drug bcu yod pa dag myur du byed du chug la/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad kyang rdo ba dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par gnas par gyis shig /rgyal po rnams ni tshig gis 'grub pa yin la/

lha rnams ni sems kyis 'grub pa yin/ rnal 'byor pa rnams ni sems bskyed pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa yin pas blon po rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas bskyed mos tshal gsum

po skye yod dang / n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas dag tu bskyed mos tshal re rer yang rgyal byed kyi tshal 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang khang chen bcu drug dang / khang pa'i gzhi drug bcu yod pa dag byed du bcug cing grong khyer

ser skya'i gnas thams cad kyang rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par gnas par byas so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gson zhing bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams la chos nyid kyis gdon mi za bar bgyi ba bcu

mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji srid du sangs rgyas su lung ma bstan pa dang / ji srid du sems can gzhan gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sems ma bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba thams

cad ma btul ba dang / ji srid du sku tshe'i cha lnga pa ma lus pa dang / ji srid du mtshams bcad pa ma mdzad pa dang / ji srid du nyan thos zung gcig mchog tu ma bstan pa dang / ji srid du grong khyer kun 'od du lha las babs pa ma bstan pa dang /

ji srid du mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam par ma bstan pa dang / ji srid du mtsho chan po ma dros par nyan thos rnams dang thabs gcig sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung ma bstan pa dang / ji srid du yab yum gnyis bden pa dag la

ma bkod pa de srid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po chen po zas gtsang dang / shAkya 'bum phrag du ma dag gdul ba'i dus nye bar gnas par gyur cing /

'di lta ste/ yab yum gnyis bden pa dag la gzhag pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas gdon mi za bar mdzad pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka'

stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ser skya'i gnas su gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dag thabs gcig ser skya'i gnas su 'gro ba dang / yab dang sras

mjal ba lta bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom

ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig ser skya'i gnas su 'gro ba dang / yab dang sras mjal ba lta bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo'o/ /dge slong dag gis tshe

dang ldan pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po las mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/ /grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs

phyin pa dang ldan pa/ thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar ba lang

gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/

nam mkha'i lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su

bskor ba/ sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar

blon po'i tshogs gyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su

bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nor sbyin ltar

gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ thag bzangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs

kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams shin tu dul ba/ spyod lam dang / spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/ chu gter ltar ting nge ba/ sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa

gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'doms gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun du bzang ba/

stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu pa/ nyag gcig dpa' ba/ gnyis pa med pa/ gnyis su mi

gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/ rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis

spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ yan lag lnga spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag

drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcur dbang bsgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa/ 'khor nyan thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /

ga ya 'od srung dang / chu klung 'od srung la sogs pa sngon gyi ral pa can stong dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du bdar te ser skya'i gnas ga la ba

der rgyu zhing gshegs so/ /de'i tshe na rgyal po zas gtsang gis nyi ma bdun pa la grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par bzhag cing bdug pa dang / phye ma 'khrigs pa dang / me tog sna tshogs bkram pa

dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad rgya chen po dag bshams shing / n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thams cad zla kham lta bur bshams te/ n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas

grong khyer ser skya'i gnas kyi bar gyi lam thams cad mdzes shing rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par bzhag ste/ spos chu'i chag chag btab cing bar bar du dar gyi chun po mang po spyangs shing / me tog gi tshoms dag kyang bshams/ bdug spos

dri zhim po'i du ba 'khrigs pa dang / me tog sna tshogs bkram pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dag rnam par bzhag go/ /rgyal po zas gtsang nyid kyis rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na 'di

lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das la sdod cing 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na chu rlung ro ha ka'i 'gram du gshegs so/ /de na dge slong kha cig ni lag pa dang rkang pa dag 'khru bar byed/ kha cig ni so shing 'dor

bar byed/ kha cig ni chu 'tshag par byed/ kha cig ni khrus byed do/ /grong khyer ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ongs shing / rgyal po zas gtsang gis n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sa phyogs

go skabs yangs par gnas mal bshams shes thos so/ /thos nas kyang shAkya 'bum phrag du ma dag n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'dus par gyur cing / de na kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul zhing lhags so/ /kha cig ni ya

mtshan skyes te je dang por yab kyis sras kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad dam/ 'on te sras kyis yab kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad pa blta'o snyam pas lhags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal

te de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs kyis ser skya'i gnas su gshegs na shAkya nga rgyal can dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas chen po ma rnyed de/ 'di ltar 'di sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas lha 'bum phrag

du mas bsu ste steng gi nam mkha' las byung ste song na/ da 'dis bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs kyang rkang pas 'ongs so zhes ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur bas bdag rdzu 'phrul gyis ser skya'i gnas su 'jug par bya'o snyam du dgongs shing rig nas/

dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed ni rkang pa dag gis chu klung ro ha ka rgol cig /de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs so/ /dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan

nas/ rkang pa dag gis chu klung ro ha ka rgal te n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs te/

ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na rdzu 'phrul gyis chu klung ro ha ka'i pha rol gyi 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur cing steng gi nam mkha' la ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar mngon par 'phags nas ser skya'i gnas kyi steng nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun

dga' ra ba ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i steng gi nam mkha' la dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs so/ /de na bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs logs su spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang bzhengs

pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba dag mdzad do/ /me'i khams la yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dag dang /

ser po dag dang / dmar po dag dang / dkar po dag dang / btsod ka dag dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo / /cho 'phrul zung dag kyang rnam par ston pa mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas me 'bar zhing sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par mdzad

do/ /sku'i stod nas me 'bar zhing sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin du mdzad do/ /de ltar phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi

cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bzhi ston par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po zas gtsang gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par gyur na ni de'i spyi bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par

'gyur la/ gal te rgyal po zas gtsang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs par gyur na ni shAkya nga rgyal can dag ci'i phyir yab tu gyur pas sras kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par byed ces ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur bas

bdag gis ci nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus ma btud bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du dgongs shing rig nas ta la bdun srid tsam

gyi steng gi nam mkha' la gzhes shing / ta la drug dang / lnga dang / bzhi dang / gsum dang / gnyis dang / gcig srid tsam na bzhugs so/ /de nas skyes bu bdun srid tsam na gzhes shing skyes bu drug dang / lnga dang / bzhi dang / gsum dang /

gnyis dang / gcig srid tsam na gzhes so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis ma btud bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shAkya rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/

gang tshe khyod bltams dog sa rab g.yos dang / /'dzam bu'i grib mas khyod sku ma btang dang / /'di dang lan gsum kun gzigs mkhyen ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas khyod kyi zhabs la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul

mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar bsdu ba mdzad nas n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra bar gshegs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang dang / bre bo zas dang / zas dkar dang / bdud rtsi

zas dang / shAkya 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /shAkya kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /shAkya kha

cig ni thag ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas cang mi smra bar mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ dpa' bo bcibs pa glang po dang / /chibs

dang shing rtas khab gshegs na/ /tsher bcas dog sa'i gzhi dag la/ /ji ltar zhabs kyis gshegs pa mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / /yang dag stsol ba'i bzhon pa yis/ /nyon

mongs tsher mas ma smas par/ /sa gzhi kun du rnam par rgyu/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ dpa' bo sngan chad ka shi ka'i/ /na bza' gsol bas rnam mdzes na/ /ngur smrig na bza' rtsub po dag /ji ltar khyod skus bzod par mdzad/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po bdag ni khrel 'dzem pa'i/ /snam sbyar gos gyon mdzes pa yin/ /gang gis thub pa'i gos gyon pa/ /zhi ba'i nags na mdzes par 'gyur/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ brtan pa sngan chad gser snod

nas/ /zhal zas ro mang ldan gsol nas/ da ltar bsod snyoms ngan pa dag /ji ltar khyod kyi mgur du byon/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos ldan dga' ba dag gi zas/ /nges 'byung ldan zhing mnyam bzhag yin/ /

zas sred spangs kyang 'jig rten kun/ /rjes su gzung phyir bdag spyod byed / /rgyal pos gsol pa/ blo bzang khyod sngon yang thog gi/ gzhal med khang steng dus mthun bzhugs/ /nyag gcig nags na khyod bzhugs na/ /ji ltar

bsnyengs dang bral bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau tam 'jigs kun rtsa dang srid/ /de dag bag nyal bcas spangs pas/ /mya ngan 'jigs bral nags gnas te/ /de na bdag 'jigs ci yang med/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ thub

dbang khyod sngon rab dgyes pa'i/ /khab na rtag tu khrus mchog mdzad/ /nags na nyag gcig khyod bzhugs na/ /de na 'byor khrus su dag bgyid/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / gau tam chos rdzing bsod nams 'gram/ /rnyog med dam

pas bsngags pa ste/ /mi lus mi gsher der bkrus pa/ /rig byed yon tan pha rol 'gro/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ dpa' bo rang gi pho brang na/ /gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/ /chab tshan rnyog dang bcas pa yis/ /ji ltar khyod kyi

sku khrus mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau tam dang klung tshul khrims 'gram/ /dang ba bsil ba mkhas pas bsngags/ /mi lus mi gsher der bkrus pa/ /rig byed yon tan pha rol 'gro/ /rgyal po zas gtsang
gis gsol pa/ zil gnon gang nas skye 'gyur zhing / /'jigs skrags gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yid 'byung gang nas skye bar 'gyur/ /zhus pa de ni bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zil

gnon gang nas skye 'gyur zhing / /'jigs skrag gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yid 'byung gang nas skye 'gyur ba/ /gson cig bdag gis khyod la bshad/ /rga dang na dang 'chi 'gyur ba/ /gal te de gsum yod min na/ /bdag kyang shin

tu yid 'ong ba'i/ /yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' mdzad pa/ /dpa' bo 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis/ /khyod la gos pa mi mnga' ba/ /legs par 'khrungs pa legs pa lags/ /

de nas rab dga' dad rgyas pas/ /drang srong dge 'dun bskor byas te/ /thub dbang zhabs la mgos gtugs nas/ /bde gshegs kun nas rtog cing sdod/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bus yon tan

gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'di

ltar rgyal po zas gtsang dang / lhas sbyin sdig pa 'dod pa nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal tsam ma gtogs pa zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /de nas

srog chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu

byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ 'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par rnam par gzhag par mdzad do/ /

rgyal po zas gtsang ni bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam du ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo / /lhas byin ni sdig pa 'dod pa dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa ma

mthong ngo / /lhas byin bden pa ma mthong zhing khro bas zil gyis non pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis kyang 'di ltar rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i sgyu ma shes par gyur na/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad rjes

su 'jug par bya ba la rag go/ /shAkya gcugs par gyur pa dga' ba ston pa dag gis de la smras pa/ lhas byin thong shig bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba yin gyis de skad ma zer cig /de nas de cang mi smra bar

'dug go/ /nyi ma gnyis pa la bskyed mos tshal skye yod du sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thabs zla gam lta bu bshams pa byas nas/ der yang bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de'i bsam pa dang bag

la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang dang / lhas byin sdig pa 'dod pa nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can ma gtogs bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri drug stong gis bden pa dag

mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /de na srog chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir

mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te 'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par

rnam par gzhag par mdzad do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ni bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam du ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo / /lhas byin ni sdig pa 'dod pa dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis bden

pa ma mthong ngo / /lhas byin bden pa ma mthong zhing khro ba'i zil gyis non pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis kyang 'di ltar rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i sgyu ma shes par gyur na/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad rjes su 'jug

par bya ba la rag go/ /shAkya gcugs par gyur pa dga' ba ston pa dag gis de la smras pa/ lhas byin thong shig /bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba yin gyis de skad ma zer cig /de nas de cang mi smra bar

'dug go/ /nyi ma gsum pa la bskyed mos tshal tshangs pa'i gnas su sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thabs zla gam lta bu bshams pa byas nas/ der yang bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de'i

bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang dang / lhas byin sdig pa 'dod pa nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can ma gtogs pa bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga

stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /de na srog chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/

kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te 'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge

'dun la bab par rnam par gzhag par mdzad do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ni bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam du ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo / /lhas byin ni sdig pa 'dod pa dang / nga rgyal las

kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa ma mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ci'i phyir rgyal po zas gtsang bden pa mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs na/ rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa mi mthong ste/ sems ha cang

mtho ba dang / ha cang zhum pas so/ /de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa sngon cad lha dang mis mchod par gyur na/ da ni mis mchod cing lhas mchod par ma gyur to/ /snyam du ha cang zhum par
gyur par thugs su chud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang gdul ba'i phyir lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du dgongs shing rig nas 'jig

rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni gal te 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad na ni tha na srog chags grog sbur gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs

sems kyis shes la ji ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad na ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na nyan thos la sogs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/

de nas tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gdul ba'i slad du lha'i 'khor 'ba'

zhig la chos ston pa bzhed par mthong ngo / /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu'i lag pa bskums pa las rkyong bar byed

pa 'am/ brkyang ba las skum par byed pa de bzhin du/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te bskyed mos tshal tshangs pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khang bzangs sgo bzhi pa sprul pa mdzad de/ sgo bzhi po dag tu 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag sgo srungs su rnam par gzhag par mdzad do/ /de nas gzugs na spyod pa'i lha

rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas g.yas phyogs su nye bar brten te 'khod do/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das

la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas g.yon phyogs su nye bar brten te 'khod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gi kun du spyod pa ni nyin mo lan gsum bcom ldan 'das la

blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nang par sngar langs te khang bzangs kyi shar sgo ga la ba der song ba dang / yul 'khor srung gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig /ci'i

phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/ /bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig yin/ rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yin no/ /

de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang bzangs kyi lho sgo ga la ba der song ba dang / 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par

mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/ /bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig yin/ rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yin no/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang bzangs kyi nub sgo ga la ba der song ba dang /

mig mi bzang gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/ /bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig yin/

rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yin no/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang bzangs kyi byang sgo ga la ba der song ba dang / rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig /ci'i phyir/

bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/ /bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig yin/ rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu yin no/ /de nas rgyal po

zas gtsang kye ma bdag gis bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pa mthong na ci ma rung snyam du 'dod pa skyes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas khang

bzangs shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul pa mdzad pa dang / 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang gis bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston pa me long gi gzugs kyi nang na 'dug pa ltar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du

sems te/ su la yang 'di lta ste/ da ltar bdag gi don thams cad grub pa lta bu'i bu med do snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems kyi rgyud ha cang mtho bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad

pa de slar bsdu ba mdzad nas rgyal po zas gtsang la chos bstan par brtsam pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ci'i phyir rgyal po zas gtsang bden pa mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs pa dang / da ltar rgyal po zas

gtsang su la yang 'di lta ste/ da ltar bdag gi don thams cad grub pa lta bu'i bu med do snyam du ha cang dga' bas sems kyi rgyud ha cang mtho bar gyur par thugs su chud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po

la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la soms shig /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song

ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan la maud gal gyi bu chen po thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu tshur gshegs/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu byon pa legs so/ /

btsun pa maud gal gyi bu gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye ba mdzad pas ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs te/ ji ltar

sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur cing shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag byed do/ /me'i

khams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dag dang / ser po dag dang / dmar po dag dang / dkar po dag dang /

btsod ka dag dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo / /cho 'phrul zung dag kyang rnam par ston te/ lus kyi smad nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par byed do/ /lus kyi stod nas me 'bar zhing lus

kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par byed do/ /shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang phyogs su 'ang de bzhin te/ phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par

'du bya ba de phyir bsdus te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di

ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ gzhan dag kyang mchis sam/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ thub pa'i nyan thos mthu che ba/ /gsum rig sems kyi rnam grangs shes/ /zag

pa zad par gyur pa dang / /dgra rnams bcom pa mang du yod/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che bar ma zad kyi/ 'di ltar nyan thos rnams la yang rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba dag

yod do snyam nas/ de na rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems kyi rgyud snyoms par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen cing / bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su

chud nas/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang gis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa

mdzad do/ /des bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/

rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ /dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/

khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas nas ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi

nang du ni bzhag /'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs ba'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/ btsun pa bdag

ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng

slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa yang gsol pa/ bu pho bzang pos pha la ni/ /lan du phan gdags gang bgyi ba/ /de ni khyod kyis bdag la

bgyis/ /sems ni mtho ris gzhol bar gyur/ /bu pho bzang pos pha la ni/ /lan du phan gdags gang bgyi ba/ /de ni khyod kyis bdag la bgyis/ /sems ni thar la gzhol bar gyur/ /ngan song dag las legs phyung zhing / /khyod

kyis mtho ris thar pa la/ /rab tu 'bad pas bdag bzhag ste/ /khyod kyis dka' ba legs par mdzad/ /tshong pas khe spogs rnyed pa ltar/ /mtho ris rnyed pa bdag gis rnyed/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ni/ /nye bar rten

pa bzang ba lags/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bden pa mthong nas zas dkar la smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis rgyal srid byed du chug shig /da ni rgyal po'i drang srong gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /lha ci'i slad du rgyal srid
bgyid du mi stsol/ ngas bden pa dag mthong ngo / /lhas nam gzigs / deng nyid do/ /lhas deng nyid gzigs kyi bdag gis gang gi gdugs la bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs
pa de nyid kyi gdugs la bden pa dag mthong lags so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bre bo zas dang bdud rtsi zas la smras pa/ gzhon nu gnyis khyed kyis rgyal srid byed du chug shig /nga ni
rgyal po'i drang srong gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /ci'i slad du rgyal srid bgyid du mi stsol/ ngas bden pa mthong ngo / /lhas nam gzigs/ deng nyid do/ /lhas deng nyid gzigs kyi bdag cag gis
ches sngar mthong lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams kyi bu thu bo gang yin/ gzhon du bzang ldan lags so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu bzang ldan shAkya'i rgyal
por dbang bskur ro/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ nyin gcig mi chad par rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral
ba can las rab tu byung ba dka' thub kyis lus mi sdug par snang ba dag mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di dag sems ni bzang ba yin na lus mi bzang ste/
dka' thub drag po dag gis lus mi sdug par snang ba dag yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ci 'dra bar 'khor yang de 'dra ba nyid du gyur na de lta na bcom ldan 'das mdzes
par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams bsdus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na cir 'gyur/ lha 'khor

los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /khyed kyi bu dag cir 'gyur/ lha zhabs ring bar 'gyur ro/ /'o na da gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas bdud rtsi thugs su chud de/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad na khyed kyi

bu dag ci'i phyir zhabs ring mi byed/ lha ci lags de dag rab tu dbyung ngam/ rab tu phyung shig /lha shAkya'i rigs rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim re re nas re re rab tu phyung shig /lha

bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya gzhon nu rnams kyis khyim re re nas re re rab tu dbyung bar bya'o zhes dril bsgrags pa byas so/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril bsgrags

pa de'i tshe na bzang ldan dang ma 'gags pa dang / nam gru la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya rab tu byung ngo / /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das
kyis 'di lta ste/ rigs mthon po las rab tu byung ba ni rnyed pa'i phyir dang nye ba yin no/ /zhes gsungs pas de dag las rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis dgongs pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag gzhan gyi phyir kho nar rab tu byung ba yin na/ gzhan kho na la chags so snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag las rnyed pa dang bkur
sti byung ba gcad par bzhed nas ser skya'i gnas su ci dgyes par bzhugs nas mnyan yod ga la ba der gshegs te/ mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas
mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/

de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ mthar gyis mnyan yod na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo / /khyim

bdag gi chung ma sbed mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang brang brdungs te smras pa/ 'char ka ci'i slad du khyod kyis bdag spangs te rab tu byung / 'char kas smras pa/ byang chub sems dpas btsun mo grags 'dzin ma dang /

sa 'tsho ma dang / ri dgas skyes la sogs pa bud med drug khri spangs te rab tu byung ba ni shin tu dka' ba yin gyi rdul gyi rdzab 'dra ba khyod la mi bra ba ci yod/ 'char ka bdag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo / /de ltar gyis shig /khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /

'char ka de der dus dang 'thun pa'i dus su 'ong zhing smras pa/ sbed ma rab tu mi 'byung ngam/ sbed mas smras pa/ da dung khyim gyi bya ba legs par ma bsdus so/ /sbed ma dus de tsam gyis ko sa lar byung ba'i khyim gyi bya ba yang legs par bsdus par 'gyur ro/ /

'char ka deng legs par bsdus te sang rab tu 'byung ngo / /'char ka 'di snyam du sngon yang bdag lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyis zil gyis mnan par 'gyur bas gal te bdag gis dge slong ma rab tu phyung bar gyur na drug sde dag gis dge slong

ma rab tu phyung ngo zhes rgya cher zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der rgyu zhing song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas de rgyal po'i khab tu

dbyar gnas par khas blangs te 'dug go/ /sbed ma yang phyi de nyin par khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs nas de dge slong rnams kyi gan du song ste dris pa/ 'phags pa dag de gar mchis/ de su yin/

'phags pa 'char ka'o/ /de rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo / /sbed mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ sbed ma ci'i phyir ngu / 'phags pa 'char ka'i mchid nas khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus la

mchi shig dang / bdag gis rab tu dbyung ngo zhes mchi nas bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te mchis na de rgyal po'i khab tu mchis pas da ni bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la/ rab tu byung ba yang ma lags

so/ /dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/ sbed ma 'char ka spu gri'i phyir rgyal po'i khab tu song bas spu gri sar pas khyod kyi skra 'dreg par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong ma gso sbyong 'bul ba dag rgyal byed kyi tshal du lhags nas de dag gis sbed ma

ngu ba mthong nas smras pa/ sbed ma ci'i phyir ngu / 'phags pa 'char ka'i mchid nas khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus la mchi shig dang / bdag gis rab tu dbyung ngo zhes mchi nas bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te

mchis na/ de rgyal po'i khab tu mchis pas da ni bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la rab tu byung ba yang ma lags so/ /g.yengs ma dge slong dag su zhig dge slong ma rab tu 'byin par byed/ 'di ltar dge slong ma rnams kyis dge

slong ma rab tu 'byin par byed kyis tshur shog /'phags ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mis khyod rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta ma'i gan du khrid nas smras pa/ 'phags ma khyim bdag

gi mchis brang sbed ma 'di rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mis de rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so/ /'char ka 'di snyam du bdag gis lhung bzed nag po can rnams
rjes su srung bas khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma rab tu ma phyung bas rgya cang dang / lcag por dang / shur bu dang / shur bu phre'u dag gi bar chad kyang byas la/ de yang lhung bzed nag po can
'ga' zhig gis rab tu phyung bar gyur na de dang phrad du yang mi ster ro snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas de mi dga' bzhin du dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/ /mnyan yod na rgan zhugs

shig mi dga' bzhin du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa des lhung bzed dang chos gos mchan khung du bcug ste dgag dbye byas pa na dgag dbye legs par byas so/ /dgag dbye shin du byas so zhes de rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der

song ste/ mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gtsug lag khang gi sgo na lam la rnam par lta zhing 'dug pa des thag ring po kho na nas rgan zhugs mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba/ smin ma

'phyang ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong nas 'char kas bsams pa/ dge slong 'ong ba 'di gnas brtan gang yin pa su'o snyam nas/ des smras pa/ gnas brtan byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so phyag 'tshal lo/ /des smras pa/ slob dpon phyag 'tshal

lo/ /'char kas 'di ni rgan zhugs shig ste/ slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes pa zhig go snyam du shes nas 'char kas de gtsug lag khang du bcug ste smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod ga las 'ongs/ des smras pa/ mnyan yod nas

so/ /'char kas bsams pa/ gal te dang po kho nar sbed ma'i gtam dris na 'phya bar 'gyur bas 'di ltar snga phyir byas te dri bar bya'o snyam nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ji lta bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang /

bde ba dang / snyun mi mnga' ba dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes sam/ btsun pa 'char ka de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang / snyun mi mnga' ba dang /

stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ji lta dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang / dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam

nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas sam/ ston pa la lta bar 'dod dam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa 'char ka de bzhin te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / dge slong ma'i

dge 'dun dang / dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas shing ston pa la blta bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan par

'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa ji lta gnas brtan kun shes kau N+Di N+ya dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang / gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / gzhan yang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gnod

pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas sam/ btsun pa 'char ka de bzhin te/ gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan

yod na gnas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ji lta ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang / rnying pa dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / legs skyes dag shes sam/ btsun pa 'char ka

de bzhin te shes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'o na khyod kyis khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma shes sam/ btsun pa 'char ka shes te de ni btsun pa 'char ka'i sngon gyi chung ma yin no/ /rgan zhugs gtam shes so/ /de da dung yang khyod kyi

khyim bdag gi chung ma yin snyam 'am/ de ni rab tu byung ngo / sus rab tu phyung / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mis so/ /'char kas bsams pa/ da dung spyod yul lhag ma dang bcas pa yin no snyam nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs tshur shog /

rkang pa dag khrus shig ces des de la rkang pa bsku ba dang / lag pa bsku ba mang po byin nas des de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ya gad btsugs te zung mthon po la bzhag nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs gtsug lag khang 'di ni zas dang bcas pa/ rnyed pa

dang bcas pa yin gyis gtsug lag khang 'dir mngon par dga' bar gyis shig /des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka bdag ni mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs te 'gro ba yin pas bdag gnas 'di mi 'dod do/ /'char kas de'i mdun du

sgo lcags dang lde mig khyog po dag bzhag ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gnas pa dang bcas par bya'i mi gnas par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal to zhes smras

nas mig lam du mi snang bar song ste/ de mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas 'char kas rang gi gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/ legs par byugs/ lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs te sgo bcad nas khri'i

steng na phyi gan du nyal zhing skad kyi gdangs kyis kha ton byed cing 'dug go/ /dge slong ma 'dun pa 'bul ba dag lhags nas de dag gis de'i skad kyi gdangs thos nas de dag gis de la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa 'char

ka khyod gar bzhud bzhud/ 'char kas smras pa/ rgyal po'i khab tu'o/ /de dag dbyar khang du dong nas sbed ma la smras pa/ sbed ma dga' ba skyed cig /khyod kyi slob dpon 'ongs so/ /kho mo'i slob dpon gang / 'char ka'o/ /de ji ltar kho mo'i slob

dpon/ ci kho mos de'i gan nas blags sam/ g.yengs ma khyod kyis mi shes dge slong ma rnams ni dge slong la rag mang du las kyis khyod song la ltos shig /sbed mas nas kyi dar phye dang khrus kyi chal dang / 'bru mar thogs te 'char

ka'i gtsug lag khang du song nas sbed mas 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang gi sgo brdungs pa dang / 'char kas smras pa/ de su yin/ sbed mas smras pa/ bdag sbed ma'o/ /khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma 'ongs pa legs so/ /bdag da dung

yang khyod kyi khyim bdag gi chung ma lags sam/ 'o na ci yin/ bdag rab tu byung ngo / /khyod sus rab tu phyung / 'phags ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mis so/ /kho bo re shig bya ba de lta bu zhig byung nas de'i phyir kho bo rgyal po'i

khab tu song na khyod la brtad pa ci byung na de'i phyir khyod rab tu byung / khyod gyi zhal nas khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus la shog shig dang / kho bos khyod rab tu dbyung ngo zhes gsungs nas/ bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te

mchis na khyod rgyal po'i khab tu bzhud de/ gal te bdag 'phags mas rab tu ma phyung du lags na bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la rab tu byung ba yang ma lags par 'gyur ro/ /'char kas smras pa/ sbed mas ci kho bo bdag nyid kyi

lag ngar la sos 'debs par byed dam/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mis rab tu phyung yang rung / kho bos rab tu phyung yang rung ste legs kyis nang du zhugs shig dang chos bstan par bya'o/ /sbed mas 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te

chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/ /des de la chos bstan par brtsams te/ des de la ji tsam pa de tsam du chos bstan nas sngon gyi bgad pa dang / dga' bar byas pa dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dran par bya bar brtsams

te/ sbed ma bdag cag gnyis kyis bskyed mos tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha'i gnas ga ge mo zhig tu zas 'di dang 'di lta bu zos pa dang / bca' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'chos pa dang / btung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'thungs pa gang yin pa de dran nam

zhes smras pa dang 'char ka kun du chags par gyur to/ /ji lta ji ltar chags par gyur pa de lta de ltar dral to/ /bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa chags par gyur

pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang / dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang / mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang / gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes pa dang / khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/ gal

te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par brten cing 'dug la/ gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon par brten cing 'dug pa'o/ /sbed ma des 'char ka de chags so snyam du shes nas sbed mas smras pa/ slad rol du mchis te slar

mchi'o/ /'char kas bsams pa/ 'di bshang ba byed 'dod dam/ gci ba byed 'dod gor ma chag snyam nas des smras pa/ song shig /sbed ma phyir byung nas shing nga dpung bcad brdzes te rgyug par brtsams pa dang / 'char ka

de sgra la mkhas pa yin pas des de'i sgra thos nas des de'i phyi bzhin du byung ste/ dge sbyong ma mgo reg mo gar 'bros shes de de'i phyi bzhin rgyug par brtsams pa dang / de la brla'i reg pas khu ba byung nas de kun nas dkris pa dang bral

te glang po che chags pa dang bral ba bzhin du gzhi de dag nyid na 'dug go/ /sbed mas de kun nas bkris pa dang bral zhing phyir log pa mthong nas 'di kun nas dkris pa dang bral lo snyam du rig nas drung du song ste tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces

smras so/ /'phags pa gal te bdag gis dang du blangs par gyur na bdag kyang dge slong mar mi rung ba nyid du 'gyur la/ khyod kyang dge slong du mi rung ba nyid du 'gyur ro/ /sring mo bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed la/

gzhan srung na bdag nyid srung bar byed do zhes legs par gsungs so/ /ji ltar bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed ce na/ sten par byed pa dang / goms par byed pa dang / lam mang du byed pa dang / rjes su srung bar byed pa dang / reg par byed

pa dang / mngon sum du byed pa ste/ de ltar bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed do/ /ji ltar gzhan srung na bdag nyid srung bar byed ce na/ tho mi 'tshams pa dang / mi gshe ba dang / mi 'tshe ba dang / rjes su brtse ba dang / rjes su snying brtse ba dang /

byams pa'i sems kyis te/ de ltar gzhan srung na bdag nyid srung bar byed do/ /'phags pa sham thabs 'di tshur stsol bkru bar bgyi'o/ /'char kas sham thabs de sbed ma la byin no/ /sbed mas khu ba de mthong nas 'gyod pa

skyes te/ bdag gi lus kyi phyogs btsun pa 'char kas sngon ma mthong ba 'am sngon ma mnams pa 'am/ sngon ma byugs pa ci zhig yod na bdag gis dang du ma blangs pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so snyam du 'gyod pa skyes so/ /

sbed ma de ltar rnam par rtog pa na de kun du chags shing dral bar gyur pa'i sems kyis khu ba de rang gi mngal gyi go sar blugs so/ /sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas de la sems can zhugs par

gyur to/ /de dge slong ma rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ sbed ma kho mo cag ko khyod chos bzang po'i chos kyis 'phags pa 'char ka'i gan du 'gro bar sems kyi kho mo cig gis des khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur byas par mi sems so/ /sbed

mas smras pa/ phu nu mo dag dge slong de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/ gang tshun chad rab tu byung nas des kho mo la sngon chad lan 'ga' yang lag gis kyang ma byugs so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ ma byugs na yang des khyod gnas

skabs 'di 'dra bar byas na/ gal te byugs na des khyod gnas skabs ji lta bur byas par 'gyur zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod do/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong ma de ni pham par ma gyur gyis 'di ltar phyogs dben par bzhag ste bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med pa gyis shig dang / bu gzhon nu 'od srung zhes bya ba btsa' bar

'gyur zhing nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te 'di lta ste/ dge slong gzhon nu 'od srung de ni nga'i gtam sna tshogs dang / gtam snyan pa dang /

spobs pa dge ba can rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa dge slong rnams kyi nyes dmigs byung ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos rnying pa 'khrur 'dzud pa las gyur pa

yin no snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba

la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos rnying pa 'khrur 'dzud dam/ 'tshed du 'dzud dam/ 'chag tu 'jud na spangs ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka

'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/ /nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs las brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin pa de phan cad ni nye du ma

yin no/ /gos shes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o/ /rnying pa zhes bya ba ni dus tshigs

gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung bar spyad pa gang yin pa'o/ /'khrur 'dzud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na chur snyug pa byed du 'dzud na'o/ /'tshed du 'dzud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na tshon du snyug pa byed du 'dzud na'o/ /'chag tu 'dzud

dam zhes bya ba ni tha na thal mos rdebs par byed du 'dzud na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar

'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'tshed du 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'chag tu 'dzud na spang ba'i

ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'dzud dam/ 'khrur 'dzud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/ 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/ 'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/ 'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud

dam/ 'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/ 'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud pa dang / 'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas gos rnying pa 'khrur

'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'tshed du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/ 'khrur 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/ 'tshed du 'dzud pa

dang 'khrur 'jud dam/ 'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/ 'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/ 'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/ 'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud pa dang / 'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur

ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'tshed du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro / /'chag tu 'jud na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'khrur

'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/ 'khrur 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/ 'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/ 'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/ 'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/ /'chag tu 'jud pa dang

'tshed du 'jud dam/ 'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud pa dang / 'chag tu 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la yid gnyis za bas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'dzud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'tshed du

'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'chag tu 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/ 'khrur 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/ 'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/ 'tshed du 'jud pa dang

'chag tu 'jud dam/ 'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/ 'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/ 'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud pa dang / 'chag tu 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos

pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ rigs mthon po las rab tu byung ba 'di ni rnyed pa rnams kyi phyed dang nye ba yin no/ /zhes bka' stsal pas de na yang shAkya'i khyim nas rab tu byung ba de dag la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung nas

de dag shin tu gos kyis cha ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas shing / lhung bzed dang chos gos dang dra ba dang phor bu dang / ska rags lhag pa dag kyang 'chang bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dus dang dus su

chos bstan kyang de dag gis bden pa dag ma mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ci'i phyir shAkya rab tu byung ba dag bden pa dag mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs nas de dag shin du gos kyis cha ba la sbyor ba'i rjes

su brtson par gnas shing de dag lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang dra ba dang phor bu dang / ska rags lhag pa dag 'chang ba'i phyir te/ gal te ngas shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams la smad na dbral dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du dgongs nas/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul ba la mkhas pa bla na med pa yin pas de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed kyis/

nga'i spyan sngar dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang / 'di nyid gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par dge slong gang gis kyang nye bar 'ong bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa dag dbyar gyi nang dag tu

dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las gang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro bar mi bya ste/ dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stobs

pa cig dang / 'di nyid kyi gos sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las gang bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro ba de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du gzhug go zhes khrims su bya ba bcas so/ /bcom ldan 'das

zla ba gsum nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa na dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang / de nyid kyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par der dge slong 'ga' yang mi 'gro'o/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye sde zla ba

shol ma bor bas dbyar ljongs su gnas par khas blangs la/ bcom ldan 'das ni zla bshol bor bas dbyar ljongs su gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sde dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos

byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod ga la ba der rgyu zhing song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas tshe dang

ldan pa nye sde lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang ga la ba der song ba dang / dge slong drug sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa nye sde thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong

nas kyang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar kho na na don nyung ngus dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba 'dral bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras so/ /gzhan dag gi smras pa/ des de ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du gzhug go/ /gzhan dag gis smras

pa da ltar sbyor ba la 'jug gis gang gi tshe dral bar gyur pa de'i tshe na des de byed du gzhug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang du dal bus khad kyis sgo gtan brdungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyis de la chab sgo dbye ba mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni dge slong

glo bur du 'ongs pa la dge slong khyod da lta ga las 'ongs/ gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs shes bya ba'i so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan

pa nye sde la nye sde khyod da ltar ga las 'ongs/ gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs shes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes gsol ba/ btsun pa bdag da ltar ljongs nas mchis so/ /bdag ljongs su

dbyar gnas par mchid kyis 'tshal to/ /nye sde ljongs su dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas sam/ btsun pa bgyis so/ /nye sde gang gis khyod mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang yin/ rkyen

ni gang yin/ btsun pa 'di na gal te bdag gi g.yar sngar rab tu 'byung ba la ltos pa zhig mchis na/ bdag de la 'di skad ces bzhin bzangs khyod tshur mchi/ dgon pa pa 'tshol cig ces mchi zhing dgon pa pa nyid kyi bsngags pa

yang brjod par bgyid/ bsod snyoms pa dang / chos gos gsum pa dang / phyag dar khrod pa dang / shing drung pa 'tshol cig ces mchi zhing shing drung pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang brjod par bgyid do/ /gal te de ltar bgyi'o zhes mchi na/

de rab tu 'byin par bgyid do/ /gal te rdzogs par bsnyen par 'tshal ba dang / gnas la zhugs pa dang / klag pa la zhugs pa dang / mchid don la zhugs pa dang / yid la bgyi ba la zhugs pa zhes mchis na/ bdag de la yang 'di

skad ces bzhin bzangs khyod tshur mchi/ dgon pa pa 'tshol cig ces mchi zhing dgon pa pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang brjod par bgyid/ bsod snyoms pa dang / chos gos gsum pa dang / phyag dar khrod pa dang / shing drung

pa 'tshol cig ces mchi zhing shing drung pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang brjod par bgyid do/ /gal te de ltar bgyi'o zhes mchi na de la yid la bgyi ba stsol bar bgyid de/ btsun pa gang gis bdag mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa

dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyu ni de lags/ rkyen ni de lags so/ /nye sde khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs

pa legs so legs so/ /nye sde gang la la zhig sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag gis bsngags pa rjod par mi byed pa de ni nga'i bsngags pa rjod par mi byed pa yin no/ /gang la la sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag gi bsngags pa rjod par

byed pa de ni nga'i bsngags pa rjod par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag yul ring po nas bstod pa dang / bkur ba dang / bsngags pa dang rab tu bsngags pa'i phyir ro/ /nye sde khyod dge 'dun gyi khrims

su bya ba mi srung ngam/ btsun pa bdag gis dge 'dun gyi khrims ni gang lags/ khrims su bgyi ba ni gang lags ma 'tshal to/ /nye sde 'di na ngas dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dag nga zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du

yang dag 'jog bzhed kyis/ nga'i spyan sngar dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par dge slong gang gis kyang 'ong bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong gi

dge 'dun gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa dag dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las gang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la ltar

'gro bar mi bya ste/ dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las gang bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro ba de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi
ltung ba byed du gzhug go zhes khrims su bya ba bcas so/ /btsun pa bdag ni glo bur du mchis pa lags te/ don de ni dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis bsrung bar bgyi ba lags so/ /

nye sde dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pas kyang dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba bsrung bar bya ba kho na yin no/ /nye sde 'di ltar ngas dge slong glo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'i
chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pas gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas dge slong dag la gnas 'di na khrims su bya ba ji lta bu yod ces dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'dri na de lta na legs/

gal te mi 'dri na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /nye sde de lta mod kyi ngas dge slong dgon pa pa la dgon pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong dgon pa pa de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir ltar 'gro

ba'i dus ma yin pa med do/ /dge slong bsod snyoms pa dang / rnyed pas chog pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang / zas phyis mi len pa dang / stan gcig pa dang / chos gos gsum pa dang / phying ba pa dang / phyag dar khrod pa dang / shing drung pa dang / dur khrod

pa dang / cog pu pa dang / bla gab med pa dang / gzhi ji bzhin pa la gzhi ji bzhin pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong gzhi ji bzhin pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do/ /de nas

tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yi rang bar byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas drug sde dag

tshe dang ldan pa nye sde ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye sde je skabs phye shig /ltung ba sde lnga po dag la skabs phye'o/ /khyod la ltung ba byung ba de chos bzhin du slar gyis shig /ltung ba ma

mthong ngo / khyod kyis dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba ma dral tam/ dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba ji lta bu yin/ /drug sde dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes drug sde dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang

ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis nye sde de lta mod kyi ngas dge slong dgon pa pa la dgon pa pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong dgon pa pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir ltar 'gro ba'i dus ma yin

pa med do/ /dge slong bsod snyoms pa dang / rnyed pas chog pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang / zas phyis mi len pa dang / stan gcig pa dang / chos gos gsum pa dang / phying pa pa dang / phyag dar khrod pa dang / shing drung pa dang / dur khrod pa dang /

cog bu pa dang / bla gab med pa dang / gzhi ji bzhin pa la gzhi ji bzhin pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong gzhi ji bzhin pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas shAkya rab tu byung ba de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba rnam par smad cing / 'dod pa chung ba la bstod pa ni don gyis na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag smad pa mdzad pa yin gyis bdag cag gis lhung

bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags lhag pa dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la btad ste rgyud dag pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'dong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas dge slong de dag lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / phor bu dang /

ska rags lhag pa dag khyer te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag las lhung

bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang ska rags lhag pa 'di dag bzhes shig /tshe dang ldan pa dag de'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus de'i bar du sdod cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo

bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skabs de bcom ldan 'das la

rgyas par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ /kun dga' bo de'i phyir long la blangs nas kyang gtsug lag khang chen po zhig tu spungs te zhog la dge slong gang des brel ba'i dge

slong de la de sbyin par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams las lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags

lhag pa dag blangs nas gtsug lag khang chen po zhig tu spungs te bzhag go/ /de nas shAkya rab tu byung ba de dag lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang phor bu dang / ska rags lhag pa dag nad ji lta ba dang / 'bras ji lta ba

dang / zug rngu ji lta bzhin du spangs nas chos gos gsum pa lhur len cing rgyud dag pa dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag

'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya rab tu byung ba de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du

'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /de dag gis bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag cag gis
