bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags te/ 'phags pa nye dgas bdag cag las dri ma can dang phral nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod de/ yang dang yang du bdag cag la chos kyis sdud par byed pas

bdag cag gis kyang de la zang zing cung zad kyis bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /bzang mo de bzhin bya'o/ /rje'i sras bdag gis dog pa 'jam po bkal te/ dog pa de las tha ga pa che ge mo zhig la ras yug chen 'thag tu stsal cing slad kyis

ras yug chen skon par bgyi'o/ /khyim bdag des dog pa de tha ga pa la byin nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyis dog pa 'di las ras yug chen thogs shig dang 'phags pa nye dga' la dbul bar bya'o/ /de ltar bya'o/ /bu mo des de thos

nas bsams pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dga' ba de sbran par bya'o snyam mo/ /nye dga' yang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mthar gyis

bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim der zhugs pa dang / bu mo des khyim legs par byugs shing phyag dar bor nas/ des nye dga' mthong ba dang rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dgyes pa sbran par

bgyi'o/ /nye dgas smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis kho bo la dga' ba ci zhig sbran par bya/ khyim bdag 'di khyod la ras yug chen 'bul bar 'gyur ro/ /nye dgas bsams pa/ sa'i steng na 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag dang bdag

mnyam par deng bu mo 'dis kyang 'phrigs so snyam du rig nas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo ci kho bo la tho 'tsham par byed dam/ bu mos smras pa/ bdag ci'i slad tu 'phags pa la tho 'tsham par bgyid/ nye dgas

smras pa/ bu mo gal te bden par gyur na ni ngas khyod la gshe ba dag la chugs ma bya 'o/ /ji ste brdzun par gyur na ni brdeg btsog mang po byed tu bcug ste sngon gyi gnas ji lta bar gzhag par bya'o/ /'phags pa gal te

bdag la thugs mi ches na phyogs ga ge mo zhig na tha ga pa mchis pa der bzhud cig dang khyod nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /de der song te tha ga pa la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ras yug chen 'thag pa 'di su'i yin/ 'phags pa btsun pa nye

dga'i lags so/ /khyod kyis nye dga' shes sam/ ma 'tshal to/ /de ni kho bo yin no/ /bzhin bzangs srid tu 'di tsam gyis srings shig /'phags pa dog pa sus stsol bar 'gyur/ khyim bdag de nyid kyis sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /kho bos kyang khyod la cung

zhig nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /nye dga' phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i khyim du zhugs nas/

des de'i stan bting ba dang / de de la 'dug nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/ /des de la chos bstan nas des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci lags/ deng spyan drangs sam/ bsod snyoms

mdzad/ bsod snyoms bgyid do/ /des bsams pa su zhig bdag bas bsod snyoms ches bzang ba 'bul bar 'gyur snyam nas des de la hwags kyi la thu dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo/ /nye dgas de dag blangs te tha ga pa de'i gan

du song nas des de la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs je lag pa gnyis zed cig des lag pa gnyis bzed pa dang / des de la la thu cig byin nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs je zo shig /des de zos pa dang / des de la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs la

thu'i ro ci 'dra/ 'phags pa bda'o/ /khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' la thu 'di 'dra ba zos sam/ 'phags pa lan 'ga' yang ma 'tshal to/ /thu ba zed cig /des thu ba bzed pa dang / des de'i thu bar la thu thams cad blugs te

smras pa/ bzhin bzangs kho bo'i ras yug chen 'di legs par thogs shig /kho bos khyod la phyis kyang la thu chung zad nye bar bsgrub par byas zhing du 'di tsam gyis skyed cig /'phags pa dog pa bas par gyur na sus

stsol bar 'gyur/ khyim bdag de nyid kyis sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /des ras yug chen de 'thag pa na dog pa zad nas de khyim bdag de'i gan du song ba dang / ji tsam na khyim bdag gi chung ma ni med/ khyim bdag ni 'dug
nas thag pa des khyim bdag de la smras pa/ khyim bdag ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pa zad kyis dog pa byin cig khyim bdag des byin te btang ngo / /yang 'thag pa na dog pa zad pa nas de yang

khyim bdag de'i gan du song ba dang / ji tsam na khyim bdag ni med khyim bdag gi chung ma ni 'dug nas tha ga pa des khyim bdag gi chung ma de la smras pa/ sru ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pa zad kyis dog pa byin cig /des byin te btang

ngo / /yang 'thag pa na zad nas de khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang / ci tsam na khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gi chung ma gnyi ga 'dug nas tha ga pa des khyim bdag de la smras pa/ /khyim bdag yang ras yug chen de btag pa'i

dog pa zad kyis yang dog pa byin cig /khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ kye tha ga pa ci ras yug chen de bskyed dam/ khyim bdag gis chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo ci khyod kyis kyang 'di la dog pa byin nam/ stsal to/ /khyim

bdag gis smras pa/ kye tha ga pa ci ras yug chen de bskyed dam/ tha ga pas smras pa/ khyim bdag ci deng bskyed par brtsams snyam 'am/ nyi ma gang kho na la btsun pa nye dga' mchis nas 'di skad ces srid tu 'di tsam gyis srings

shig /zheng du 'di tsam gyis skyed cig ces mchi ba'i nyi ma de kho na la bskyed par brtsams so/ /khyim bdag gi chung mas bsams pa/ ras yug chen de ci 'dra ji ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de der song ba dang / ji tsam chen po la 'os

pa'i ras yug chen mthong ngo / /de mthong nas de'i mig khrag gis gang ste smras pa/ kho mos ras yug chen 'di 'phags pa nye dga' la mi byin no/ /kho mos de'i don du ras yug chen gzhan zhig 'thag tu gzhug go zhes zer te

song ngo / /nye dga' dus dang dus su der 'ongs nas smras pa/ kye tha ga pa rung ngam/ 'phags pa bdag gi ni rung na khyod kyi ni mi rung ngo / /kye tha ga pa ji ltar gyur/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gi chung ma mchis par gyur te des ras yug chen mthong nas de'i mig

khrag gis gang ste/ kho mos 'phags pa nye dga' la ras yug chen 'di mi sbyin no/ /kho mos de'i don du ras yug chen gzhan 'thag tu gzhug go zhes mchi ste mchis so/ /kye tha ga pa khyod la kho bos cung zhig byas pa yod pa shes sam/ des smras pa

ci'i slad du ma 'tshal/ bdag da dung yang khyod kyi la thu dag 'tshal zhig mchis so/ /kye tha ga pa gang gi tshe kho bo khyim der 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe na khyod kyis ras yug chen 'di khyer shog shig /'phags pa je bzhud cig dang bdag gis

kyang kha tshar bkal te mchi'o/ /nye dga' de'i khyim du song ste sgo'i thad kar 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te kha sgor lta zhing mdun du 'dug go/ /tha ga pa des kyang ras yug chen de'i kha tshar dril nas de khyer

te der song ba dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma des de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des lag brdas ma 'ong shig ces byas pa dang / tha ga pa des phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas ltos bzung bas mgo smad de nang du zhugs nas

des ras yug chen de khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i pang du bzhag pa dang / nye dgas tsham tshom med par blangs te smras pa/ a rog khya sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /

don gyi mchog 'thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi gos thob par gyur cig /khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gis rang gi sug pa nas dbul gyis slar stsol cig /nye dgas smras pa/ kho bos 'di je rung bar

byas/ de'i 'og tu khyim bdag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan skon du gzhug go/ /khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kha dog dkar po bsngags so/ /nye dgas smras pa/ drang srong gi rgyal mtshan skon du

chug shig ces smras nas langs te song ngo // //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po sum bcu rtsa lnga pa/ tha ga pas smras pa/ khyim bdag gi btsun mo bdag la gla byin cig /des smras pa/ kho mo'i ras yug chen gcig kyang

'phrog tu bcug nas gla gzhan yang ded dam/ song la khyod kyis gang la ras yug chen byin pa de nyid la gla dos shig /de nye dga'i gan du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag la gla stsol cig /song la khyim bdag gi chung

ma de nyid la dos shig /'phags pa khyim bdag gi mchis brang de mchid 'bo zhing 'di skad ces khyod kyis gang la ras yug chen byin pa de nyid la gla dos shig ces mchi'o/ /nye dgas smras pa/ song shig dang byin par 'gyur ro/ /

tha ga pa de yang de'i gan du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag gi btsun mo bdag la gla byin cig /des smras pa/ kwa'i khyo ga khyod 'dug mi phod dam/ gal te 'dug na ni 'dug shig /mi 'dug na kho mos khyod kyi mgrin par chol

zangs btags te mnyan yod thams cad tu bskor bar bya'o/ /tha ga pa de yang nye dga'i thad tu song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gi mchis brang des bdag spyos te/ kwa'i khyo ga khyod 'dug mi phod dam/ gal te 'dug

na ni 'dug shig mi 'dug na kho mos khyod kyis mgrin par chol zangs btags te mnyan yod thams cad tu bskor bar bya'o zhes mchi yis 'phags pas bdag la gla stsol cig /nye dgas smras pa/ kye nang rje gal te gang

gis kho bo'i ras yug chen 'thag tu bcug pa de'i gla kho bo 'jal bar gyur na kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang tshur shog rtsis byas khyod kyis kho bo las bag phye'i rin dang / zhun mar dang /

hwags la sogs pa ji tsam khyer ba dag khod cig ces rtsis byas pa dang / ji tsam na ches lhag par khyer bar gyur nas/ nye dgas tha ga pa de yud tsam zhig nyi tshan la btags te btang ngo / /tha ga pa de shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong

rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/ /bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/ de ltar lhag pa kho na bya'o zhes zer la 'bri ba kho nar byed do zhes smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams

kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/ nye dga' khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/ btsun

pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi

bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas tha ga pa

nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu bcug pa las de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung nas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa shes par

gyis shig /gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag gis tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa gos 'di zheng che ba dang / khrun ring ba dang / thar gyis zhag pa dang / thags ran bzang bar legs par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa 'di ltar kho bos

gla rngan 'di lta ste/ bza' ba 'am/ bca' ba tsam 'am bza' rgyu cung zad sbyin no zhes smras nas/ de la gal te dge slong des gos bsgrub pa'i phyir gla rngan 'di lta ste/ bza' ba 'am/ bca' ba tsam 'am/ bza' rgyu cung

zad cig sbyin zhing gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /khyim bdag ces bya ba ni skyes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gi chung ma

zhes bya ba ni bud med do/ /nye du ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/ /tha ga pa zhes bya ba ni thags mkhan no/ /nye du ma yin pa la

zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/ /gos 'thag tu bcug pa las shes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i

gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o/ /de na gal te dge slong de la zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' la'o/ /sngar ma bstabs par zhes bya ba ni sngar mgron du ma bos par ro/ /rnam par

rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung nas shes bya ba ni bsnyen bkur byed pa 'ga' byung nas so/ /tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste zhes bya ba ni drung du song ste'o/ /'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa shes par gyis shig /gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag

gis shes bya ba ni bdag nyid nye bar ston par byed pa'o/ /zhing che ba zhes bya ba ni rgyar che ba'o/ /khrun ring ba zhes bya ba ni chur ring ba'o/ /thar gyis zhag pa zhes bya ba ni 'jur mdud med pa'o/ /thags ran bzang bar zhes bya ba ni byer zug snyoms pa

dang / shas bzang ba dang / sad sed med par ro/ /bza' ba 'am zhes bya ba ni bza' ba lnga po dag go/ /bca' ba tsam 'am zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dag go/ /bza' rgyu zhes bya ba ni bza' ba'i rgyu'o/ /de la gal te dge slong des shes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu

nye dgas so/ /gos bsgrub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gos thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /gos grub na zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes

gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis ji tsam du gos bsgrub pa'i phyir khri las ldang bar byed/ gos dag dang / sham thabs gon par byed/ lag pa dang / lhung bzed 'khru bar byed/ bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed/ bca' ba lnga dang

bza' ba lnga dag slong bar byed/ tha ga pa la sbyin par byed cing ji srid tu gos thob par mi byed kyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /gos thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /gal te phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu gos 'thag tu bcug gis de khyod kyis blta

bar bya'o zhes sngar bstabs par gyur na ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /'thag pa skyed pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa chos shes bya ba ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa zhig yod pa des ji srid tu de gnas ngan

len kun tu spyod par mi shes pa de srid tu de dang lhan cig gnas so/ /gang gi tshe des de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par shes pa de'i tshe na de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te/ bcom ldan 'das

kyi bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ko

sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos

btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs

gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig /dga' bos thos te/ thos nas kyang nye dga' la smas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' shes par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos

dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des

chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo na/ gal te bdag cag 'di nyid tu 'dug na ni sgo 'phar brgya dag 'das te ci nas kyang lto dgang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so/ /ji ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro na ni bcom ldan 'das

kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bcwa brgyad yod par gsungs pas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ gal te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro

na re shig chu yang rnyog pa can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/ shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyis bdag cag dge slong rab tu bshes pa 'ga' zhig khrid de/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod

cing mdun du dong na de lta na bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nye dgas smras pa/ slob dpon re shig gser gyi snod spangs te sa'i snod kyis bsod snyoms rgyu bar byed dam/ khyod kyi lhan cig gnas

pa chos lta bu ngo tsha shes pa/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa/ bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa su la yod/ des kho bo mthong bar yang mi 'dod do/ /slob dpon bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don 'thun

pa gang dag bka' stsal pa de dag las slob dpon gyis 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te 'jud par byas pa yod dam/ de ni thams cad kyi thams cad tu med do/ /de'i phyir khyod kyi gnas skabs de lta bu der gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa chos kyi snam sbyar

rnyings nas des ras yug chen zhig rnyed nas bsams pa/ bdag song la mkhan po la zhus te snam sbyar btsem par bya'o snyam nas/ des de khyer te dga' bo'i gan du 'phags pa dang / de 'gro ba na bsod snyoms pa zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa/

tshe dang ldan pa chos gar 'gro/ des smras pa/ kho bo'i snam sbyar rnyings te kho bo'i ras yug chen 'di rnyed pas bdag song ste mkhan po la zhus la snam sbyar btsem par bya'o/ /bsod snyoms pas smras pa/ gal te khyod snam sbyar sar pa gzhan

'tshem na snam sbyar rnying pa 'di kho bo la byin cig /de bzhin bya'o/ /de dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa/ mkhan po bdag gi snam sbyar rnyings te bdag gis ras yug chen 'di rnyed pas snam sbyar btsem par zhu'o/ /nye dgas smras pa slob dpon 'di ni

de'i dus lags so/ /dga' bos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chos kho bo nyid la snam sbyar zhig yod pa de kho bos khyod la sbyin no/ /mkhan po mi 'tshal te bdag gis ras yug chen 'di las snam sbyar drubs te bcang bar bgyi'o/ /nye dgas smras pa/ tshe dang

ldan pa chos kho bos ko gzhan thos la gzhan mthong ste/ kho bos khyod ngo tsha shes pa/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa/ bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa yin par shes kyi/ kho bos khyod 'di ltar mkhan po'i chos dang ldan pa'i tshig gcog par mi shes so/ /

ci khyod mkhan po dang mi mthun pa'i don yang dag par len par byed dam/ de dge slong dbang chen pos smad pas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / dga' bos kyang de la snam sbyar byin no/ /des de blangs nas smras pa/ mkhan po khyod ras yug

chen 'di bzhes shig /tshe dang ldan pa chos ci kho bos khyod la brje ba'i phyir snam sbyar byin nas ras yug chen yang khyod nyid khyer cig /des bsams pa/ bdag la yo byad don med pa 'dis ci bya/ bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la dbul

bar bya zhing snam sbyar rnying pa 'di yang bsod snyoms pa de la sbyin pa mkhan po la zhu'o snyam nas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la dbul bar bgyi zhing snam sbyar rnying pa 'di yang bsod snyoms pa zhig gis

bslangs pas de la stsal bar bgyi ba mkhan po la zhu'o/ /de bzhin gyis shig /des ras yug chen de dge 'dun la phul zhing snam sbyar rnying pa de yang bsod snyoms pa de la byin no/ /phyi de nyin par de snam sbyar de gyon te

mkhan po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang / dga' bos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chos shes par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das ko sa la

dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo na/ gal te bdag cag 'di nyid du 'dug na ni sgo 'phar brgya dag

'das te ci nas kyang lto gang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so/ /ji ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bcwa brgyad yod par gsungs pas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma

dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro bar 'gyur bas gal te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro ba na re shig chu yang rnyog pa can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/ shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyis/

bdag cag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing mdun du dong na de lta na bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing / rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mkhan po bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas

gshegs pa la phan yon bcwa brgyad mchis par bka' stsal pa gang dag lags pa de dag mkhan po la nyes dmigs kho nar gyur te bdag ni re shig bcom ldan 'das nyid dang thabs gcig mchi'o/ /dga' bos smras pa/

kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong ngo / /des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid dang lhan cig mchi'o/ /dga' bos spyos te smras pa/ ngan pa ci kho bos khyod la chos la chos nyid bzang pos snam sbyar byin snyam 'am/ khyod kho bo dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i phyir byin

pa yin na gal te kho bo dang lhan cig mi 'gro na snam sbyar 'on cig khyod la mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa chos kyis bsams pa/ bdag la chos gos phrogs pa ni bla'i bdag gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo

snyam nas des de la snam sbyar phyir byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/ grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang

ldan pa/ thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs

kyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/

sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/

tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/

nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su ba skor ba/ 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis

yongs su bskor ba/ nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba/ thags bzangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs

pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/ spyod lam dang / spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa chu gter ltar ting nge ba/ sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum

bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun du bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs

pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu pa/ nyag gcig dpa' ba/ gnyis pa med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gis bzhugs

pa rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i

dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ yan lag lnga spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug

yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs

bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa/ 'khor nyan thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang /

chu klung 'od srung la sogs pa sngon gyi ral pa can stong dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du bdar te ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs so/ /

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyur gshegs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis sku thams cad kyis g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis la las legs par ma bgos pa dang / legs par ma bcangs par ma gyur tam snyam du rnam

par gzigs par mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis rnam par gzigs pa na tshe dang ldan pa chos chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro ba gzigs so/ /gzigs

nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dge slong dbyar gnas pa rnams kyis chos gos kyi rnyed pa ma grub 'am/ bcom ldan 'das grub bo/ /'o na ci'i phyir dge slong chos chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang

bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro/ /des skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong la gos byin nas 'phrog par byed dam/ btsun pa 'phrog par bgyid

do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par

mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la rmas pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong la gos byin nas yang phyir phrogs pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du

mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan

thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas 'phrog gam 'phrog tu 'jud cing / de la 'di skad ces dge

slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces zer na dge slong des lhag ma yod pa phyir sbyin par bya zhing btang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu dga' bo 'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /dge slong la zhes bya ba ni

chos 'di pa'o/ /gos shes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/ /byin nas shes bya ba ni phyir sbyin mi

dgos par ro de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o/ /khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas shes bya ba ni khro ba ma sangs par ro/ /'phrog gam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/ /'phrog tu 'jud cing zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/ /dge slong

des shes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/ /lhag ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i lhag ma gang yod pa'o/ /phyir sbyin par bya zhing zhes bya ba ni gtang bar bya zhing ngo / /btang na zhes bya ba ni lus dang bral bar byas na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung

byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ lus g.yo bar byed pa dang / tshig rjod par byed pa dang /

de gnyis ka dang ldan pa dang / gzhan dag gis so/ de la ji ltar lus g.yo bar byed pas she na/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas lus kyis rtul bar byed cing 'dren par

byed khrid par byed la/ tshig gis dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces ni mi zer na ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi gra lus la bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur

te/ de ltar lus g.yo bar byed pas so/ /ji ltar tshig rjod par byed pas she na/ dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces tshig rjod par byed la

lus kyis rtul bar mi byed na ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyis grwa lus las bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur te/ de ltar tshig rjod par byed pas so/ /ji ltar de gnyis ka dang ldan pas she

na dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas lus kyis kyang rdul bar byed cing tshig gis kyang dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces zer na ji srid

tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/ de ltar gnyis ka dang ldan pas so/ /ji ltar gzhan

dag gis she na dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge slong 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyis ka la nyes byas re

rer 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na gnyis la spang ba'i ltung byed re rer 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge slong ma 'phrog

tu 'jud na ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge slong ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong

gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge slob ma 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la gos

kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge slob ma la nyes byas nyid tu 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge tshul

'phrog tu 'jud na/ ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer 'gyur ro/ /gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge tshul la nyes byas nyid tu 'gyur la/ /dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'jud na ji sid du

'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge tshul ma 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid tu gos kyis grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer

'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge tshul ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid

ma rangs nas khyim pa 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu khyim pa la bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar

byed na khyim pa la bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas khyim pa mo 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du

gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye

bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur te/ de ltar gzhan dag gis so/ /don gzhan dang 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis ni ltung ba med do/ /ji ltar don gzhan gyis she na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po'i lhan cig gnas pa dang

nye gnas dag 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su dus ma yin pa dang / chu klung gi kha 'am/ yur po che'i khar 'gro ba de dag la slob dpon dang / mkhan pos chos rkun pa dang / g.yon can dag gis gos dag phrogs par gyur na mi

rung ngo snyam pas 'phrog gam/ 'phrog tu 'jud pa ste/ de ltar don gzhan gyis so/ /ji ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis she na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyi lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i

zla bo dang / sdig pa'i sten grogs dag dang lhan cig sdig pa sten cing lam du 'gro bar gyur na de dag la mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyis 'di dag sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i zla bo dang / sdig pa'i sten grogs la sten par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam

pas gos dag 'phrog tu 'jud pa ste/ de ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis so/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /'phrog pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ri brag shig na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig 'dug pa des dgon par dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rta

babs mthon po dang ldan pa mthong khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa/ snying dang mig 'phrog par byed pa/ mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa/ khri dang / khri'u dang / yo byad phun sum tshogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ de na dge slong drug bcu

gnas pa de dag la khyim bdag des chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pa mkho ba stobs par byed do/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas khyim bdag de la bu zhig yod pa de'i gan du dge slong de dag dong ste smras

pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyi phas dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba bstabs pa byas par gyur na khyod kyis kyang kho bo cag dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba stobs

par byed nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag la la ni brgya la bsnyen bkur byed/ la la ni stong la/ la la ni 'bum la bsnyen bkur byed pa yang yod/ la las ni bdag nyid kyang gso bar dka' bas bdag gis rngo mi thog go/ /de nas dge

slong de dag gtsug lag khang de nas dong ngo / /rgan zhugs ri brag de nyid nas rab tu byung ba gnyis shig bsod snyoms brgyus nas gtsug lag khang de nyid na 'khod do/ /byang lam nas don 'thun dag lhags nas de dag gis gtsug lag khang de thag ring po

kho na nas mthong nas de dag der dong ste tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gtsug lag khang stong par 'dug nas de dag gis bsams pa/ dge slong dag nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs sam/

yang na nyin mo spyod tu dong gor ma chag snyam nas de dag de na yongs su bskor ba na rgan zhugs de gnyis mthong nas de dag gis de gnyis la smras pa 'phags pa gnyis dge slong dag gar dong / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag 'di na dge slong dag mi 'khod

do ji slad tu/ khyim bdag gang gis gtsug lag khang 'di byed tu bcug pa des dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba bstabs par byas par gyur te dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas dge slong rnams kyis de la

bu zhig yod pa de'i gan du song ste bzhin bzangs khyod kyi phas dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas bstabs par byas par gyur na khyod kyis kyang kho bo cag dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs

pas mkho ba stobs par byed nus sam zhes smras na/ de na re 'phags pa dag la la ni brgya la bsnyen bkur byed/ la la ni stong la/ la la ni 'bum la bsnyen bkur byed pa yang yod/ la las ni bdag nyid gso bar dka' bas bdag gis rngo mi thog

go zhes zer nas dge slong de dag dong ngo / /kho bo cag gnyis ni bsod snyoms brgyus nas gtsug lag khang 'di nyid na 'khod do/ /ded dpon gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag yun ring po nas smon pa/ kye ma bdag cag gis dge 'dun gyi

gtsug lag khang byed tu gzhug cing gtsug lag khang byed tu bcug nas dge slong rnams la mkho ba bstabs par bya'o/ /snyam na/ gtsug lag khang 'di ni byas zin pa yin pas gtsug lag khang 'di nyid tu dge slong rnams la mkho ba bstabs par bya'o zhes

des ras yug chen bting ste/ shes ldan dag khyed cag las gang gis ji yongs su btang ba de 'dir phul cig ces smras pa dang / de dag gis kyang ji 'byor ba der phul nas der rnyed pa mang po 'dus par gyur pa dang ded dpon gyis rgan zhugs de gnyis la smras pa/ 'phags pa

gnyis 'di ni dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms lags so/ /'di ni brgyad ston dang / bcu bzhi ston dang / nya ston gyi bsod snyoms lags so/ /'di ni na ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad lags so/ /'di ni rnyed pa lags so/ /'di ni chos gos

kyi zong lags kyis dge slong bzang po dag spyan drongs shig /bdag cag dbyar 'das nas 'dir mchis te dge slong brgya la mkho ba bstabs par bgyi'o zhes smras te dong ngo / /rgan zhugs gcig gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa

sus sba bar bya/ cig shos kyis smras pa/ gang gzhon pas so/ /de gnyis las gang gzhon pas rnyed pa de sbas nas des smras pa/ rgan zhugs mnyan yod nas dge slong dag bod na der gang 'gro bar bya/ rgan pas smras pa/ gang gzhon pa

'gro bar bya'o/ /gzhon pas smras pa/ kho bos rnyed pa sbas kyis khyod der song shig /rgan pa shos mnyan yod tu dge slong sbron du song ngo / /drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing

lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/ rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/ rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas tshe dang ldan

pa nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des thag ring po kho na nas rgan zhugs mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba smin ma 'phyang ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong nas des bsams pa/ dge slong gnas brtan zhig 'ong ba 'di

gang yin bsu'o snyam nas des de la gnas brtan byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so/ /phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang / de na re slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo zhes zer nas nye dgas bsams pa/ kye ma 'di ni rgan zhugs shig

ste slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes so snyam nas des de la smras pa/ rgan zhugs ga las 'ongs/ ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang ga ge mo zhig nas mchis so/ /rgan zhugs ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/ 'on te phongs pa yin

gtsug lag khang ni ci 'dra/ phongs pa ni ci 'dra/ gang na yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang yin la/ gang na yo byad thams cad dang bral ba ni phongs pa yin no/ /de sngon ni phongs par gyur la/ da ni gtsug lag khang

du gyur to/ /ji ltar gyur byang lam nas don 'thun dag lhags nas de dag gis der dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms dang / brgyad ston dang / bcu bzhi ston dang / nya ston dang / na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad dang / rnyed pa

dang / chos gos kyi zong dag phul nas 'di skad ces 'phags pa dge slong bzang po dag bos shig /bdag cag kyang dbyar 'das nas 'dir mchis te dge slong brgya la mkho ba bstabs par bgyi'o zhes mchi'o/ /nye dgas

smras pa/ 'on tang khyod dge slong rkur 'ongs mod/ lags so/ rgan zhugs ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas

sbyin dang / bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang / rnying pa dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / legs skyes dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can mang po gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong rnams la yo byad

thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas shing / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nyi ma re re zhing yon bshad pa byed pa na yang gnas 'dir dge slong gang dag ma 'ongs pa de dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing 'ongs pa dag kyang mngon par dga' bar gyur cig ces zer la/

de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / na ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis brel ba med cing bcom ldan 'das kyang mngon sum du chos ston par mdzad pas 'di na chos kyi longs spyod dang / zang zing gi longs spyod phun sum

tshogs pa yin pas gal te dge slong rnams kyis khyod dge slong rkur 'dir 'ongs par shes par gyur na khyod gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyis/ dge slong gzhan la de skad ma zer cig /'di ltar kho bo cag mi drug re re la yang 'khor bcu bcu

yod pas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'ong ngo / /slob dpon bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mchis te slad kyis mchi'o/ /nye dgas bsams pa/ lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis 'di mthong zhing de thos nas dang po kho

nar 'gro bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis lha ni yid kyis bskor ba yin gyi lus kyis bskor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ma thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / chos rnams yid kyis 'dren byed cing / /yid gtso yid kyi

'gros can yin zhes gsungs kyis/ 'di nyid nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshol cig ces des de'i gnya' ba nas bzung ste rgan zhugs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal

lo zhes gyis shig ces 'dud tu bcug go/ /slob dpon skom gyis ji skom 'thung du mchi'o/ /'di nyid tu sdod cig dang kho bos skom gyis phor bu bkang ste khyer te 'ong ngo zhes des skom gyis phor bu bkang ste blud nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs

da song shig ces des de thag ring por bskyal nas da phyir ma ldog cig ces bsgo ste bdag nyid phyir log go/ /drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni gang chung zad ci thos pa de phyem bred kyi dus kyi tshe gcig tu 'dus nas phan tshun rjod par byed pa yin

pas nye dga' gtsug lag khang du song ste drug sde rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis yun ji srid kyis brel ba spang bar bya/ khyod kyis thos pa chung zhig yod dam/ yod de/ ri brags kyi gtsug

lag khang ga ge mo zhig tu byang lam nas don 'thun dag lhags nas de dag gis der dge slong drug bcu'i dbyar zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms dang / brgyad ston dang / bcu bzhi ston dang / nya ston dang / na ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dang / rnyed pa dang

chos gos kyi zong dag phul gyis der dong ngo / /ci de nyid tu dbyar gnas par bya 'am/ mi bya ste/ 'di ltar dbyar gyi nang nyid tu de dag zos te 'di nyid tu 'ongs la dbyar phyi ma nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su gnas par khas blang bar bya'o/ /de dag der 'ong ba dang rgan zhugs

kyis de dag thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so zhes de gnyis kyis de dag gi gnas khang dag bskos shing gnas mal dang / khri dang / khri'u dang / chu ra dang / phor bu dang / chu

tshags dang / lde mig khyog po dag phog go/ /de dag gis bsams pa/ bdag cag don gang gi phyir lhags pa de je brtag par bya'o snyam nas de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis 'dir rnyed pa ci grub pa dag ji bltas 'on cig /rgan zhugs

de gnyis drang po'i rang bzhin can yin pas de gnyis kyis 'di ni dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms so/ /'di ni brgyad ston no/ /'di ni bcu bzhi ston no/ /'di ni nya ston no/ /'di ni na ba'i rkyen to/ /'di ni sman gyi yo byad do/ /'di ni

'di'i rnyed pa'o/ /'di ni chos gos kyi zong ngo zhes rnyed pa de dag thams cad bstan no/ /de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag rgan zhugs ser sna can yin pas zas bsod pa sbyin par mi nus la 'di ltar rgan zhugs 'di gnyis

kyis dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pas yongs su spang ba sbyin no zhes de dag gis de gnyis la yongs su spang ba sbyin nas de gnyis kyang bdag cag gnyis kyis yongs su spang ba thob bo zhes dga' bar gyur to/ /de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang

ldan pa dag dge slong lto mdun can 'ga' zhig la bcol na des dge 'dun la nyi ma re re zhing bca' ba rnam pa bcwa brgyad dang / tshod ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang / legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba yang 'brim par 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis dge slong

lto mdun can zhig la bcol ba dang / des de dag la nyi ma re re zhing bca' ba rnam pa bcwa brgyad dang / tshod ma snum pa bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang / legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba yang 'brim par byed pas dus cung zad cig gis bsod snyoms

thams cad spyad pa dang / dge bskos kyis rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun gyi gdugs gcig kho na'i spyi bungs shig mchis so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag bslab pa yang dag par ma

blangs pa de dag ni brgyad ston dang / bcu bzhi ston dang / nya ston byed la/ bdag cag bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa dag de mi byed kyis de yang bza'o zhes de dag gis de yang zos pa dang / dge bskos kyis yang rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste

smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag da ni dge 'dun gyi na ba'i rkyen dang yo byad dag gcig mchis so/ /drug sde dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ji srid du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'tsho ba de srid tu bdag cag rtag tu nad pa yin pas na ba'i sman de

yang bza'o zhes de dag gis de yang zos nas de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khur ya gcig na 'dug par dka' ba yin gyis gos kyi rnyed pa 'di yang bgos la/ khur do mnyam pas bde bar 'dong bar bya'o zhes de dag gis de yang bgos

pa dang / dge bskos kyis yang rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/ da ni dge 'dun gyi gdugs gcig kho na'i spyi bungs las ma mchis so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis khyed gnyis na re dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba

gsum gyi bsod snyoms yod do zhes zer na dbyar gyi nang du zad par gyur to/ /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ ci de dag gis bca' ba rnam pa bcwa brgyad dang / tshod ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang / legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sha stag

rims shig ces smras sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis gnya' ba smad de spyod spyod la da smod par byed kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di gnyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las gyis shig /kha cig gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis myur du bzod

pa gsol cig /phyis bzod pa gsol na ltag pa'i spyi byi bar 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyis bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang / kha cig gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag rgan zhugs 'di gnyis drang po'i rang bzhin can yin gyis 'di gnyis la

bzod pa gyis shig /de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis bzod par bya'o/ /ri brags 'di ni ma dad pa mang bas 'dir bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed kyis gal te lhag rol cung zad yod na de yang byin cig /'on te med na ni kho bo cag 'dong ngo / /tshe dang

ldan pa dag ci yang med kyis deng shig /de dag de nas dong ste mnyan yod tu song nas de dag der phyin pa dang dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs so/ /dbyar 'das pa dang don 'thun de dag yang lhags nas de dag gis de bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa'i

skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gtsug lag khang stong par mthong nas de dag gis bsams pa/ dge slong dag nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs sam/ nyin mo spyod tu dong gor ma chag snyam nas/ de

dag de na yongs su bskor ba na rgan zhugs de gnyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa gnyis dge slong dag gar dong / bzhin bzangs dag 'di na dge slong dag mi 'khod do/ /'phags pa gnyis bdag cag gis dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba

gsum gyi bsod snyoms ma phul lam/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ dge slong dag lhags par gyur nas de dag gis dbyar gyi nang nyid tu thams cad zos te dong ngo / /khyed gnyis kyis dge slong gang dag khrid de 'ongs/ drug sde dag go/ /'phags pa

gnyis khyed gnyis rgya mtsho chen por dong nas nor bu mching bu dag khyer te 'ongs so/ /de na dge slong gzhan dag med dam ci na drug sde dag khrid de 'ongs/ de dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/ /bram ze'i tshul ni

tshig ste/ 'di ltar bdag cag gi dad pa'i myu gu skyes ma thag tu bcom mo zhes smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung

ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgos pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su

'thun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/

dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar

gdon par bya ste/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgo bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgo bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos

rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen

mo gau ta mI dang / chos byin gnyis las skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ni spong ba ma 'khor yang spong ba ma dang ldan pa yin la/ chos byin ni mdo sde'i mtha' pa 'khor yang mdo sde'i mtha' pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de gnyis dbyar khang cig tu gnas

par khas blangs nas gang gi tshe/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i 'khor rnam par langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na chos byin gyis rang gi 'khor la nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs

par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de thams cad skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI las brten pa yin la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhan gyi sems srung ba'i gang zag ni bsod nams mang du skyed par byed do/ /

zhes gsungs kyis/ khyed cag kyang re shig mi rtag pa nyid yid la bya ba sgoms shig ces 'doms par byed cing / /de dag kyang mi rtag pa nyid yid la bya ba sgom par rtsom mo/ /gang gi tshe chos byin gyi 'khor rnam par langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na skye dgu'i

bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI yang rang gi 'khor la nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' pa spyod pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs

su chud pa gang yin pa de thams cad la phan pa'i rgyu yin la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhan gyi sems srung ba'i gang zag ni bsod nams mang po skyed par byed par byed do zhes gsungs kyis/ khyed cag kyang re shig mi rtag pa nyid dang

ldan pa'i mdo' sde'i mtha' dag kha ton gyis shig ces 'doms par byed cing / de dag kyang mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo' sde'i mtha' dag kha ton du byed par rtsom mo/ /dge slong ma dag de ltar phan tshun sems rjes su srung bas dge ba'i

chos rnams kyis mi 'phel te/ chu med pa nas ut+pa la bzhin no/ /chos byin la dge bsnyen sa ga zhes bya ba mngon par dad pas des yo byad thams cad kyis de mgron du bos so/ /dus gzhan zhig na dge bsnyen sa ga chos

byin gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal tu 'ongs pa dang / chos byin gyis de la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag dbyar khang gcig tu gnas par khas blangs pas de dag phan tshun sems rjes su srung bas

dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phel te chu med pa nas ut+pa la bzhin du gyur na khyod kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi phyir dbyar khang byed du 'jud nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag la kAr ShA pa Na dag ni mchis na sa gzhi

rgyal po dbang bas sa gzhi'i slad tu rgyal po la gsol ba mdzod cig dang der bdag gis dbyar khang bgyid tu stsal to/ /dge slong ma chos byin btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i gan du song ba dang / btsun mo phreng ldan mas smras pa/ 'phags ma byon pa legs so/ /

byon pa legs so/ /'phags ma sku don ci zhig gi slad tu byon/ bdag dge slong ma'i dbyar khang zhig bgyid tu stsol bar 'tshal na sa gzhi rgyal po dbang bas sa gzhi'i slad du rgyal po la gsol ba bgyi bar 'tshal lo/ /'phags

ma khyod bzhud cig dang / bdag gis 'phags ma'i slad du lha la gsol bar bgyi'o/ /chos byin song ba dang btsun mo phreng ldan ma ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du song ste des smras pa/ lha khyod kyi pho brang du 'phags ma

chos byin byon par gyur pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /de ci'i slad tu byon/ de dge slong ma'i dbyar khang zhig bgyid tu stsol bar bzhed nas/ dog sa rgyal po mnga' bas dog sa'i slad tu rgyal po la gsol ba bgyid ces

mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te 'phags ma chos byin re shig gnas 'di nyid tu bzhed na yang de 'di nyid tu bzhugs la rag ste/ nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed tu gzhug go/ /gal te mi bzhed na gang du dgyes pa de dbyar khang bgyid tu stsol la rag go/ /

btsun mo phreng ldan mas chos byin la lhas 'phags ma la dam pa gsol te/ gal te 'phags ma chos byin gnas 'di nyid tu bzhed na yang de 'di nyid tu bzhugs la rag ste nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed tu gzhug go/ /gal te mi bzhed na gang du

dgyes pa der dbyar khang bgyid du stsol la rag ces byung ngo zhes spring ngo / /chos sbyin gyis dge bsnyen sa ga la ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bdag la dam pa byin te/ gal te 'phags ma chos byin re shig gnas 'di

nyid tu bzhugs rag ste nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed tu gzhug go/ /gal te mi bzhed na gang du dgyes pa der dbyar khang bgyid tu stsol la rag ces byung ngo zhes spring ngo / /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ral gri'i mthu can dang /

rgyal rigs bzang po pa zhes bya ba'i khrom gnyis yod pa las/ ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom dmag gi gnas su song ba dang / de dag gi chung ma rnams skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed pas phyogs de go skabs

dben par gyur nas chos byin gyis smras pa/ phyogs 'dir dbyar khang byed tu chug shig /dge bsnyen sa gas phyogs der dbyar khang byed tu bcug nas dge slong ma rnams kyis der gnas par brtsams so/ /ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dmag gi

gnas nas phyir 'ongs te/ de dag gis chung ma de dag bkug cing bkug cing brdeg par brtsams pa dang / srang dag na de dag ngu ba'i sgra rta'i skad dang / glang po che'i skad lta bu'i skad mthon po dang / skad chen po dag byung ngo / /dge slong ma rnams kyis

smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag dgung char gyis 'jigs pa sa dang la kha'i 'og tu zhugs so/ /chos byin gyis bsams pa/ 'di dag las kha cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba yod dam snyam du bsams na/ yod par mthong ngo / /su la rag lus

snyam du bsams na bdag nyid la rag lus par mthong nas des smras pa/ nu mo dag gdul ba la ltos pas thams cad bzod par bya'o/ /chos byin gyis phyogs gcig tu gyo mo sar pa bzhag ste dge slong ma rnams la smras pa/ nu mo dag

khyed cag gang la sder lhag yod pa de thams cad gyo mo 'dir chug shig /de dag la sder lhag ci yod pa de thams cad gyo mo der 'jud par byed do/ /de na byis pa dag der 'ong bar gyur nas chos byin gyis de na khye'u gang dag yin pa de dag la ni 'bru mar

byin nas gcig gis gcig gi mgo skud tu bcug ste rang gi lag gis bca' ba dag sbyin par byed do/ /bu mo gang dag yin pa de dag la ni bdag nyid kyis 'bru mar gyis mgo bskus nas rang gi lag gis bca' ba dag sbyin par byed do/ /byis pa de dag gis

de dag khyer te rang rang gi khyim dag tu dong ba dang de dag gi ma dag gis dris pa/ khyed cag la 'di dag sus byin/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags ma chos byin gyis so/ /chung ma de dag gis bsams pa/ don gyis na 'phags ma chos byin ni

bdag cag la ma ma'i bya ba mdzad do snyam du rig nas de mngon par dad par gyur te/ de dag gis bsams pa/ gang gi tshe bdag cag gi khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas su 'dong ba de'i tshe na bdag cag gis khyim thab dag bskyal nas 'phags ma

chos byin la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam mo/ /dus gzhan zhig na de dag gi khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas su 'phags pa dang / chos byin gyis de dag 'dul ba'i dus shes nas gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/ legs par byugs/

lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bskus te 'dag rdzas dang / chu dang dri dang / gdug pa dang / me tog dang / pog por bzhag nas dge slong ma skad snyan pa dag bskos te bsdad pa dang / chung ma de dag kyang khyim thab dag bskyal te chos byin gyi drung

du lhags nas chos byin gyis de dag la 'dag rdzas dang / lag pa bsnyal ba'i chu dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / pog por dag byin nas tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun

gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /de dag kyang de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/ /chos byin gyis de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud

nas ji nas kyang de dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa byas so/ /de dag gis bden pa mthong nas
smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag gis dge ba'i shes gnyen 'phags ma la brten nas 'phags mas bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma

bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis

te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams

kyi nang du ni bzhag /'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/ 'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon

par zhugs pa lags so/ /'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ 'phags ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/ bdag cag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/

deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de dag mngon par dad par gyur nas khyim khyim du dong ste chag chag btab/ legs par byugs/ lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bskus te spyod lam zhi bas 'khod do/ /

de dag gi khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas nas phyir 'ong ba na bsams pa/ bdag cag gi chung ma glang po che 'tsho ba 'am/ ba lang rdzi 'am/ su zhig dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed cing 'dug snyam mo/ /de dag gis bdag cag gi

khyim thab dag 'ongs shes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bshes pa dang bcas pa'i tshig gis rje'i sras dag byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so zhes bsu nas de dag rang rang gi khyim du dong ba dang / de dag rang rang gi chung ma dag gis

bsku mnye dang dril phyi byas te khrus byas nas legs par bskus te zas byin no/ /de dag gis bsams pa/ 'di dag gi spyod lam 'di lta bu ni sngon ma byung ngo snyam nas de dag la dris pa/ bzang mo dag khyed kyi spyod lam 'di lta bu 'di sngon

ma byung ba yin na ji las gyur/ de dag gis smras pa/ rje'i sras dag 'phags ma chos byin gyis bdag cag la ji nas kyang bdag cag 'khor ba na 'khor ba rnams la slan chad nyon mongs pa de lta bu kun du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos

bstan pa mdzad do/ /de dag gis bsams pa/ 'phags ma chos byin ni ma dul ba 'dul bar mdzad pa yin te/ des 'di dag btul ba lta ste/ gang gi phyir bdag cag gis 'di dag bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / spyo bas gdul bar ma

nus pa dag 'phags ma chos byin gyis chos bstan pas btul bas 'phags ma chos byin gyis bdag cag la phan btags kyis/ bdag cag gis kyang rgyal po bltas te 'phags ma chos byin la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam mo/ /chos byin

gyis kyang de dag gdul ba'i dus shes nas gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/ legs par byugs/ lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bskus te 'dag rdzas dang / chu dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / pog por bzhag nas dge slong ma skad snyan

pa dag bskos te bsdad pa dang / de dag kyang rgyal po bltas nas chos byin gyi drung du lhags pa dang / chos byin gyis de dag la 'dag rdzas dang / lag pa bsnyal ba'i chu dang dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / pog por dag byin nas tshigs su bcad

pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /de dag kyang de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/ /chos byin gyis de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang /

khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas ci nas kyang de dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa byas so/ /de dag gis bden pa mthong

nas smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma la brten nas 'phags mas bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang

ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / 'dza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag

las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag /'khor ba ni mthar

bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/ 'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /

'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ 'phags ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i

bar du glo ba thag pa nas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de dag mngon par dad par gyur nas yang smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag gis da ni srog chags grog sbur la yang bsams bzhin du srog 'gums pa'i rngo mi thog la/ bdag cag ni

mtshon chas 'tsho ba lags na bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ chos byin gyis smras pa/ gzhu gzhu rgyud med pa dag dang / mda' mde'u med pa dag dang / shing gi ral gri dag thogs shig /de dag gzhu gzhu rgyud med pa dag dang /

mda' mde'u med pa dag dang / shing gi ral gri dag thogs so/ /gang gi tshe de dag gis bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe na phyin chad brgyan pos rtse bar mi byed/ chang 'thung bar mi byed/ bud med gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par

mi byed pas de dag longs spyod dag gis phyugs pa dang nye bar bsags par gyur te/ /de dag gi glang po che dag dang / rta dag kyang yongs su ma spyad pas tsho ba dang / lpags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas par gyur to/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal

po gsal rgyal gyi ri brags pa zhig log nas der dmag ru gcig btang na bcom pa dang / rab tu bcom pa dang / so sor bcom par gyur te phyir 'ongs so/ /de bzhin du ru gnyis pa btang na de yang bcom pa dang / rab tu bcom pa dang / so sor bcom

par gyur te phyir 'ongs nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha ri brags pa'i dpung ni skyes shing lha'i dpung ni nyams te gal te lha nyid der ma gshegs na ri brags pa bsgrub dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos dril bsgrags pa

byas te nga'i yul na mtshon chas 'tsho ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad der 'gro bar bya'o zhes bsgo nas/ rgyal po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bkon te chas so/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ral gri'i mthu

can dang / rgyal rigs bzang po pa bya ba'i khrom gnyis yod pa las ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom ni mdun du 'gro ba'i mi yin la/ rgyal rigs bzang po'i khrom ni phyi nas 'ong ba'i mi yin pas rgyal pos ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom mdun

du song ba'i mi dag tsho zhing lpags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas pa dang / de dag gi glang po che dag dang / rta dag kyang tsho zhing lpags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag

khrom 'di gang gi yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i khrom ral gri'i mthu can zhes bgyi ba mdun du mchi ba lags so/ /rgyal pos rgyab tu bltas pa dang ji tsam rgyal rigs bzang po pa'i khrom gyi mi dag rid pa dang / nyam

chung ba dang / rke ba dang / skam pa dang / lus ma thob pa dang / de dag gi glang po che dag dang / rta dag kyang rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rke ba dang / skam pa dang / lus ma thob pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ /

shes ldan dag 'di gang gi khrom yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i khrom rgyal rigs bzang po pa zhes bgyi ba slad bzhin mchi ba lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci 'di dag dbang thang mnyam par mi sbyin nam/ de

dag gis smras pa/ lha dbang thang mnyam par stsol to/ /de dag bos shig /de dag bos pa dang rgyal pos de dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag dbang thang mnyam par mi sbyin nam/ lha mnyam par stsol to/ /'o na ci'i phyir ral

gri'i mthu can gyi khrom 'di dag ni 'byor pa dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas par gyur la/ rgyal rigs bzang po'i khrom khyed ni rgud pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rke ba dang / skam pa dang / lus ma thob par gyur/ lha gal

te bdag cag kyang gzhu gzhu rgyud ma mchis pa dang / mda' mde'u ma mchis pa dang / zhugs shing gi ral gri dag thogs shing mtshon cha dag btsongs shing btsongs shing 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ bdag cag kyang 'byor pa dang /

lpags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang 'di dag gi glang po che dag dang / rta dag ni yongs su ma spyad la/ bdag cag gi rta dang / glang po che dag ni yongs su spyad do/ /rgyal pos de dag la smras pa/ /shes ldan

dag khyed de ltar gyur pa bden nam/ lha mad do/ /ci khyed cag da der khrid la ri brags su gsad par 'dod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha ci lags mtshon chas g.yul sprod dam/ mis g.yul sprod/ /rgyal pos spyos te smras pa/ /

gal te mtshon chas g.yul mi sprod na khyed cag nyid deng la ri brags pa de phob shig ces smras te rgyal po de nyid nas phyir log go/ /ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dag chos byin gyi gan du song ste smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag rgyal

pos dmag gi gnas su bskos na bdag cag gis ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ chos byin gyis smras pa/ deng shig dang / khyed cag der dong ba rnams la nyes dmigs 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar gang dang gang du 'brang

'debs pa de dang der rgyud chags gsum pa lhogs shig /nyi ma gang la ri brags skor bar byed pa'i nyi ma de la mtshan thams cad du chos mnyan pa byin la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten

skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'i ming gis yon bshad pa gyis shig /de dag gis 'phags

ma chos byin gyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba byas te/ 'phags nas de dag gang dang gang du 'brang 'debs pa de dang der rgyud chags gsum pa klog par byed cing / gang gi nyin mo ri brags skor bar byed pa de'i nyin mo mtshan thams cad du

chos mnyan pa byin nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /

nye dga'i ming gis yon bshad pa byas pa dang / de'i tshe na rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin rnams gnod sbyin 'du bar 'phags pa dang / des yon bshad pa byed pa de thos nas des bsams pa/ bdag gi ming gis yon bshad pa byed pa

'di su zhig snyam nas ji tsam na chos kyi spun dag gnas ma yin par bskos pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen la smras pa/ nga'i chos kyi spun 'di dag gnas ma yin par bskos kyis song la

ri brags de phob ste 'di dag la byin la srog chags 'ga' la yang mi gnod par gyis shig /gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu las mnyan nas/ ri'i rtse mo lta bu'i glang po che dag dang / rnga mo

lta bu'i rta dag dang / gzhal med khang lta bu'i shing rta dag dang / gnod sbyin gdug pa lta bu'i mi dag mngon par sprul nas ri brag pa dag gis de dag thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /de dag gis de dag mthong nas skrag ste bsams pa/ /

yul dang srog la gnod gyur na/ /skyes bus kun du srog bsrung bya/ /blo yis gnyis ka dpyad byas na/ /yul ni yang rnyed srog rnams min/ /snyam nas de dag gis ral gri mgul du btags te ri brag nas byung ba dang / de dag gis de dag

bzung nas sgyu dpya dang bcas te mnyan yod tu bdas nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du dong ste smras pa/ lha ri brag pa ni 'di lags/ sgyu dpya ni 'di dag lags so/ /rgyal po dga' nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag sgyu dpya

dag khyed cag nyid khyer cig /de dag gis bsams pa/ bdag cag gson zhing lhags pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'phags ma chos byin gyi mthu yin pas bdag cag dong la sgyu dpya 'di dag 'phags ma chos byin la dbul lo

snyam nas de dag gis de dag khyer te chos byin gyi gan du dong nas smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag son zhing lhags pa dang / bdag cag gi dpal dang skal ba bzang po phun sum tshogs pa gang lags pa de thams cad 'phags ma kho na'i

mthu lags kyis/ rgyal pos bdag cag la sgyu dpya stsal ba 'di dag 'phags mas thugs brtse ba'i slad tu bzhes su gsol/ des smras pa/ bu dag lha rnams kyi nang du yang lha dbul ba yod kyis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge

'dun la mchod pa gyis shig dang / des khyed cag gi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs nas de dag
snga dro ni sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dag byed/ phyi dro ni chos nyan par byed do// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po sum bcu rtsa drug pa/ dus gzhan zhig na ko sa lar

byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ri brag pa gzhan zhig log nas rgyal pos rgyal rigs bzang po pa'i khrom la bsgo ba/ deng la ri brag pa de phob shig /de dag gis smras pa/ lha bdag cag ni rgud pa lags la/

ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom ni 'byor pa lags na/ 'di'i tshe de dag la bka' stsal cing bdag cag res gzhan la mchi bar ci gnang / rgyal pos ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom la bsgo ba/ deng la ri brags pa che ge mo zhig phob shig /

de dag gis smras pa/ lha bdag cag gis res khor lags so/ /deng shig dang res gzhan la mi btang ngo / /de dag gis bsams pa/ de'i tshe ni bdag cag gis gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyi mthus ri brags pa de phab

kyi/ da ni bdag gis de nyid du 'chi bar bya dgos par 'gyur bas 'di ltar bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs pa de dag la chos gos dag phul te 'dod par bya'o snyam nas/ de dag chos gos dag thogs

te gtsug lag khang du dong nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag rgyal pos dmag gi gnas su btang ste/ gal te na bdag cag de nyid tu 'gum par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas kyang mchi bar 'gyur bas chos gos 'di

dag bzhes su gsol/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gyi nang du bgo bar mi bya'o zhes bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas bdag cag mi len to/ /de dag gis smras pa/

'phags pa dag khyed cag gis bzhes te zhog la dgag dbye bgyis nas bgo bar mdzad cig ces de dag gis de dag gi gnas khang du bcug ste dong ngo / /de dag 'phags pa dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan

dag gar 'dong / khyim bdag dmag gi gnas gnas su mchi'o/ /khyed kyis res ma khor ram/ khyim bdag res khor ro/ /'o na ci'i phyir 'dong / lha'i zhal nas deng shig dang res gzhan du mi btang ngo zhes byung ngo / /kho bos lha la zhus

de'i bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig /de rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa/ lhas ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom gang du bka' stsal/ khyim bdag ri brags pa che ge mo zhig log nas de 'bebs su'o/ /lha de dag gis res ma khor ram/

khyim bdag res khor ro/ /'o na ji slad tu bka' stsal/ res gzhan du mi btang bar byas so/ /ci lhas gzhu gzhu rgyud ma mchis pa dang / mda' mde'u ma mchis pa dang / zhugs shing gi ral gri thogs pa de dag gis ri brags pa

dag mi phebs par mi mkhyen tam/ gzhan yang de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi sras sha stag ste/ de dag gis srog chags grog sbur la yang bsams bzhin du srog 'gums pa'i rngo mi thog go/ /'di ltar de'i tshe yang de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi dmag

dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyi mthus ri brag pa de phab bo/ /'di ltar de dag der mchis su lags na nongs dmigs 'ga' zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / des lha la yang ma legs par 'gyur gor ma bkum mo/ /khyim bdag ji de

dag sangs rgyas kyi sras sha stag yin nam/ lha de lags te de dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma chos byin la brten nas thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal

po gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng phyin chad khyed kyis dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo bar bya'i/ ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom la bsgo bar mi bya'o de nas ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dag phyir

mkhos su phab nas dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i tshe dge slong de dag de dag gi gan du dong ste smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag kho bo cag dgag dbye byas kyis chos gos dag byin cig /'phags pa dag bdag cag gis chos

gos dag phul lags kyis de dag bzhes shig /dge slong de dag dong ste gnas khang sgo phye ba dang / phyogs des snum zhing mngar bas chos gos de dag sril dag gis rmugs te rdul du brlags te 'dug par snang ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams

kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gos sbed pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ gos sbed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar

bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / gos kyi rnyed pa sbas pa dang ma sbas pa mi shes pa'o/ /gos sbed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa

yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / gos sbas pa dang ma sbas pa shes pa'o/ /'di ltar

bsko bar bya ste/ ji dang por spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa sbed par spro 'am/ gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas te/ gan Di brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong

rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos

kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming

'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko ste/ dge

slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi

bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin

to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa rnams dang / bslab pa la gus pa rnams dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams dang / phri ba rnams dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / mdzes pa rnams dang /

drod rig pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin pa 'di ni gnang ba yin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par

bya ste/ dge slong gis ston zla tha chung nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig rnyed la 'dod na dge slong des gos de blang bar bya'o/ /blangs nas gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o/ /de las 'das

par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/ /ston zla tha chungs nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun cad tu zhes bya ba ni zhag bcu na dgag dbye 'byung ba tshun chad tu'o/ /brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig

ces bya ba ni brtad pa las byung ba'i gos lnga po dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ nad pa la sbyin pa dang / nad pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang / 'chi ba la sbyin pa dang / shi ba'i phyir sbyin pa dang / 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa'o/ /rnyed pa la zhes bya ba ni

gzhan las so/ /'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o/ /dge slong des shes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/ /gos de zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i

gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/ /blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba'o/ /blangs nas gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni sba bar bya'o/ /

dge slong gi gos sbyin pa'i dus ni gang yin/ dus ma yin pa ni gang yin zhe na/ sra brkyang ma bting ba'i gnas ni ston zla tha chung nya tshun chad ni gos sbyin pa'i dus ma yin la/ lhag ma ni dus yin no/ /sra brkyang bting ba'i

gnas na ni ston zla tha chung nya phan chad nas dpyid zla 'bring po nya tshun chad ni dus ma yin la/ lhag ma ni dus yin no/ /de las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar 'chang na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de

spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis ji tsam du dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bdag gir byed dam/ gos

sbyin pa'i dus las 'das par 'chang na thams cad tu spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /brtad pa las byung ba'i gos lnga po dag bdag gir byed pa dang / sbyin bdag gis rang gi lag nas sbyin par byed na ltung ba med do/ /gos sbed pa'i

dge slong bskos pa dang / sbyin bdag 'ongs te 'phags pa dag bzhes shig dang / gos 'di bdag mchis nas rang gi sug pa nyid nas dbul lo zhes zer ba la ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang

tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /brtad pa las byung ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu drug pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'

ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod nas ha cang mi ring ba na ri brag shig yod pa de na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug ste de yang dad pa can bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas des dge 'dun la bsngos

te gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang / skar khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa/ snying dang mig 'phrog pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa zhig byed du bcug go/ /gtsug lag khang der dge slong

drug bcus dbyar dgag dbye dag byas te dong nas khyim bdag des der ma byin par len pa dag gis khri 'am khri'u dag ma brkus par gyis shig ces srungs ma'i mi bzhag go/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gzhan

drug bcu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri brag der phyin nas/ bsti gnas rnyed par byed pa na mi zhig gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed cag ci'i slad tu gtsug lag khang du mi gnas/ bzhin bzangs gtsug lag khang ga la

yod/ 'phags pa dag dgon pa 'di na'o/ /dge slong de dag der dong ba dang / srungs ma'i mis mthong nas/ des 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bsnyen bkur byas te gnas khang dag bskos nas khri dang khri'u dang stan nang tshang

can dang / la ba la sogs pa dag phul te/ spyangs tshags g.yar nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag re shig chab btsag par mdzod cig dang de'i bar du bdag gis khyim bdag la brjod par bgyi'o zhes mi de khyim bdag gi drung du song

ste smras pa / khyim bdag dgyes pa skyed cig /khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du dge slong blo bur du lhags pa drug bcu mchis so/ /khyim bdag gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas nang mi dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i gtsug lag khang du dge

slong gi dge 'dun byon pa dag legs par sbyar ba'i btung bas tshim par byas/ bu ram dang / hwags dang / li kha ra dang / rgun 'brum dang / bal po se'u long shig ces khyim bdag des legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sbyar nas gtsug lag
